dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small planet glows in the light of its sun. Suddenly, w hear a loud rumble, and see a thick, electronic mist behi the planet... Then, the electronic mist begins to engulf planet, and we hear the horrible sounds of destruction. Almost like somebody, or something, is eating it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strange robotic creatures scramble around the planet in a wild panic. It looks like Pompeii must have looked as Vesuvius erupted.

dialogues.speaker: ONE OF THE CREATURES
dialogues.text: The creature is KRANIX. We will meet him later on in a ve different context, but for now, he is running from the ev growing mist that threatens to engulf him.

dialogues.speaker: THE PANIC
dialogues.text: As Kranix runs, another creature, ARBLUS, calls to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Transform and flee, Kranix! You must warn all you meet of the horror of Unicron! Suddenly, the pitiful creature is surrounded by the strange energy cloud and it looks like his body has simultaneously caught fire and been doused with acid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arblus!   No!

dialogues.speaker: KRANIX
dialogues.text: The mist threatens to engulf him too. He transforms into small rocket ship and... TRACK WITH KRANIX AS... He takes off. As we rise higher and higher in the atmosph we see the horror wrought by the hideous and still myster Unicron. The planet cracks like an egg and rivers of lava leak out. The energy cloud surrounds it and... Dissolves everything... ... And when the smoke clears, we get our first look at Unicron. It is horrifying. A massive, metal with a gaping maw and a field of electricity.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: PAN FORWARD to SHOW that this hideous planet is on a dire collision course with...

dialogues.speaker: MOONS ORBITING CYBERTRON IN DEEP SPACE
dialogues.text: There are TWO MECHANISTIC MOONS orbiting the huge planet Cybertron. But we are most concerned with a small, greeni metal one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is the year 2005. The treacherous Decepticons have conquered the Autobots' home planet of Cybertron. But from secret staging grounds on two of Cybertron's moons the valiant Autobots prepare to retake their homeland.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At first, we see nothing unusual or suspicious. Then, pulling closer, we see that the top of the moon is covere with moon camouflage "netting" and underneath it is a hug cache of futuristic weapons. This is the Autobot staging ground for an assault on Cybertron. DOLLY THROUGH THE COM until we arrive at a Command Center where several Autobot peer into monitors, running constant surveillance on Cybertron.

dialogues.speaker: IRONHIDE
dialogues.text: He peers into a monitor. As he speaks, we see the monitor PAN to an area where a huge Decepticon Symbol is emblazon on Cybertron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every time I look into this thing, my circuits sizzle. I'm tired of this waiting game, Prime. When are we gonna start bustin' Deceptichops?

dialogues.speaker: OPTIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: He stands over a holographic map which shows various inva plans for Cybertron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We still don't have enough Energon cubes to power a full scale assault, Ironhide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then let me make another run to Autobot City on Earth. I'll bring you back more cubes than you'll know what to do with.

dialogues.speaker: PRIME
dialogues.text: He solemnly hands down an order

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, ready the shuttle for launch.

dialogues.speaker: IRONHIDE
dialogues.text: He raises a fist in a warwhoop!

dialogues.speaker: YAHOO
dialogues.text: (looking into monitor) Your days are numbered now Decepticreeps.

dialogues.speaker: A SMALL MOON "MOUNTAIN"
dialogues.text: Ironhide transforms and Races toward a mountain, which st about a half mile from the secret Autobot facility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jazz,    report security status.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No sign of Decepticons in this sector, Prime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Moon Base 2?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jazz to Moon Base 2. PAN UP   and through the sky to -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the second moon. It is much closer to Cybertron than the first one. This is where Bumblebee and Spike are stationed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jazz to Moon Base 2.

dialogues.speaker: BUMBLEBEE AND SPIKE
dialogues.text: They stand together a communication console. Spike is now 35 years old. Bumblebee looks as he has always looked, sa for a couple of funny bumper stickers on his tail: I (hea Cybertron. I (club) Decepticons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bumblebee and Spike here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're about to send up the bird. Any Decepticon shenanigans in your sector?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All clear, Jazz. (pause)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey,   Ironhide, tell my son, Daniel, I miss   him, and tell him I'll be coming home   as soon as we've kicked Megatron's tail   across the galaxy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ironhide and Prowl sit at the controls, running a series pre-launch tests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will do, Spike.

dialogues.speaker: PRIME, CLIFFJUMPER, AND THE OTHERS
dialogues.text: Standing at the Command Center, watching:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commence countdown, Cliffjumper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five...Four...Three...Two...

dialogues.speaker: THE LUNAR "MOUNTAIN"
dialogues.text: Suddenly, smoke starts pouring out of the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One.... Then, the "mountain" which must be made of paper mache or something blows away revealing -- The shuttle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liftoff. Suddenly, the shuttle rips out of the ground in a ball of fire.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: As it takes off, we realize this isn't any dinky shuttle, a massive ship, capable of carrying all the energon neede to fight a war and an army to boot. The screen is bathed smoke and fire which slowly clears.

dialogues.speaker: PRIME
dialogues.text: As he watches the shuttle shoot into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, all we need is a little Energon and a lot of luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a bank of computers. Suddenly, a small tape deck p open... a cassette pops out and transforms into... ...Laserbeak who flies away unseen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle    hurtles though a massive asteroid field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down, Ironhide. We want to get to Autobot city in one piece.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ironhide is at the controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I can dodge Dececpticon rays, I can sure as shootin' dodge a couple of asteroids. Suddenly, there is a terrible BANG! on the side of the sh and the two Autobots are thrown from their seats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were saying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That wasn't an asteroid. There is a blast of light and they turn to see...

dialogues.speaker: THE SHIP
dialogues.text: The most powerful laser light anybody has ever seen cuts gaping hole in the side of the ship... Then, when the lig clears, a panel of the ship falls in and we see -

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON
dialogues.text: In all his glory. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Die Autobots! Then, he transforms to Gun Mode, spins into STARSCREAM'S and Starscream fires. BRAWN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is cut in half by Megatron's blast. ON PROWL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as SCAVENGER MELTS HIM DOWN. THE INSECTICONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...eat away at the hole in the shuttle to make way for... ...an ARMY of other Decepticons including Laserbeak who enter, firing.

dialogues.speaker: IRONHIDE AND RATCHET
dialogues.text: While FIRING back are FUSED TOGETHER... ... then blasted apart and fall in smoking, glowing fragments.

dialogues.speaker: ON STARSCREAM AND MEGATRON
dialogues.text: As they enter the now empty ship, a number of Decepticons flood past them, taking positions and searching for other living Autobots. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was almost too easy, Starscream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Much easier, oh mighty Megatron, than attacking the real threat: the Autobots moon base. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're an idiot, Starscream. Were we simply to wipe out that minuscule base, they could build another one. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: MEGATRON (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But when we slip by their security systems in their own ship and destroy Autobot city, the Autobots will be vanquished forever! IRONHIDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fat chance, Megatron! Ironhide pulls himself up and grabs onto Megatron who fli him against the wall. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Such heroic nonsense!

dialogues.speaker: MINIATURE RADAR SCREEN
dialogues.text: A child's hands hold a scanner device which tracks a TRAVELING BLIP across a star map towards a pulsing dot wh represents the Earth. DANIEL (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shuttle just zipped past checkpoint zeta. ON DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel, a classic twelve year old American boy watches the portable viewer which is like an over-sized Boy Scout compass. WIDEN SHOT to show he is at an old fashioned "fishin' hole" on Earth - surrounded by weeping willows, assorted trees and shrubs, and that his fishing pole is stuck in the dirt, the line floating lazily out on the water. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's watch Ironhide land it, Hot Rod! As Daniel runs to small skateboard-like device, hits a button, and watches, it transforms into a hoverboard and rides it, like a surfer up a steep, grassy hillside we change angle to feature... HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: an "adolescent" Autobot. He is in robot mode, sitting with his fishing rod held between two fingers, looking bored with it all. HOT ROD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Talk about dull......!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Then, he tosses the rod into the water.

dialogues.speaker: ON DANIEL RIDING HIS HOVERBOARD UP THE HILL
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling excitedly) Hurry or we'll miss it! HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lopes up hill after Daniel. HOT ROD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're gonna ride, Dan-O ...ride in style! Hot Rod catches up with Daniel, scoops him off his hoverboard, TRANSFORMS to automotive mode and RIDES OVER CREST OF HILL with Daniel in the front seat.

dialogues.speaker: ON AUTOBOT CITY
dialogues.text: FOLLOW Hot Rod up and over a roadway leading around the perimeter of Autobot City which becomes visible the insta Hot Rod clears the rim of a hill. As they travel, we SHOU also be getting a sense of what Autobot City is all about (DESIGN NOTE: Autobot City looks like a federal energy project gone mad. Here, the Autobots are trying to exploi every known means of getting energy. The mountain is cove with solar panels, windmills spin in the valley, oil derr pump, and not far away a hydroelectric dam catches millio of volts. Near all of these various things are energon compressors, which turn the raw energy into energon cubes THE BACKGROUND of these scenes, we should see various pan truck-type Autobots cruise up in auto mode to stacks of t energon, convert to humanoid mode, load up their vans, th convert to Auto mode again and drive the Energon into Aut City. In short, it should be clear that the purpose of Autobot City is to harvest energy. All the while, Hot Rod Daniel are riding recklessly out from the Autobot City an into neighboring hills for an overview of the -

dialogues.speaker: CIRCULAR LANDING AREA
dialogues.text: which resides within the "bowl" created by the City struc and natural surroundings. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!   Let me out. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why settle for a peek when you can see everything from Lookout Mountain?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we're not supposed to go beyond City limits! HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chromo-Chicken!

dialogues.speaker: ON KUP AND OTHER AUTOBOTS
dialogues.text: KUP - a grizzled, "old Soldier" of an Autobot - is direct the positioning of a large metal road barricade. Hot Rod barrels through a sign which reads: "STOP -THIS AREA OFF LIMITS", almost knocking Kup over in dust and wind KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: disgustedly watches Hot Rod drive up the mountain. KUP (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to sound like swearing) Cam bustin', turbo revvin' young punk.

dialogues.speaker: MOUNTAIN ABOVE AUTOBOT CITY- LOOKOUT POINT
dialogues.text: Hot Rod arrives at a viewing platform carved in mountains and TRANSFORMS back to humanoid mode. Daniel rushes to a of PUBLIC VIEWING BINOCULARS and peers into them. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is it! Now take a squint through those babies. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod, look! There's a hole in the shuttle! HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!?

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL'S P.O.V
dialogues.text: The hole Megatron blasted in order to get into the shuttl mars the otherwise perfect exterior of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Hot Rod looks up and a pair of futuristic binoculars pop of his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: THE SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: Hot Rod's vision, now, infinitely better than human visio spots something truly disturbing -- -- Starscream, and several Constructicons inside the ship! HOT ROD (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Decepticons!

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Drawing his gun, he starts FIRING on the shuttle. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is for Ironhide.    As so's this!

dialogues.speaker: THE SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: Rays streak through the hole searing... STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He ducks away from the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm hit!

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON
dialogues.text: Standing behind a pair of Decepticons who pilot the shutt he turns to see... THE CONSTRUCTICONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Firing out of the hole. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's furious. MEGATRON (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You imbecile, our cover is blown! STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was your stupid strategy!

dialogues.speaker: KUP, CONSTRUCTION CREW
dialogues.text: Kup and the Autobot Construction Crew watch Hot Rod shoot at the shuttle. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that darn fool doing? Hound looks up and points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Decepticons!

dialogues.speaker: THE SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: Suddenly it cracks open, and Decepticons shoot out of the wreckage like toys from a pinata.

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON
dialogues.text: In mid-air

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting to forces) Attack! (he looks down and fires)

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD AND DANIEL
dialogues.text: Hot Rod pulls Daniel back as Megatron's BLAST SHEARS OFF VIEWING PLATFORM which crumbles and falls down the steep mountain!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on! Putting Daniel under one arm, he pivots and kicks up at.. ...Hook and Scavenger who are descending on him in humano mode... ...causing them both to crash against the mountainside which starts a... ...landslide which Hot Rod "rides" down the slope, pursued by... ... Decepticon FIRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (SHOUTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHoooooooaaah

dialogues.speaker: BOTTOM OF MOUNTAIN SLOPE
dialogues.text: Blitzwing flies down in jet mode, transforms to robot mod looks up at the "slide riding" Hot Rod and Daniel, transf to tank mode and takes aim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (amused) Come on down, Autobrat!

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD AND DANIEL
dialogues.text: as Hot Rod tumbles, he covers Daniel with his arms and tr unsuccessfully to slow his fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yiiiiiiiiii!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ON BLITZWING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: about to fire, when... ...Kup's arm descends into SHOT, spinning Blitzwing's tur around. Blitzwing's blast, scorches... SHRAPNEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: who is flying nearby. BLITZWING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: transforms to robot mode and turns as... Kup comes flying, feet first, into Blitzwing knocking him off the mountain ledge. FOLLOW Kup as he lands in front of Hot Rod, who is just coming to a stop at the bottom with Daniel. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad for an old timer! KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gruffly) Old timer?! That's something you'll never be if you don't get back to the city. You know what we used to do with cocky, insubordinate upstarts? HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interrupting) Save it. STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: transforming into jet mode, fires on them with laser bursts which... ... chew up the ground beside them.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD AND KUP
dialogues.text: with Daniel race toward Autobot City, transforming into vehicle mode as shots gouge the terrain around them.

dialogues.speaker: PERCEPTOR IN MICROSCOPE MODE ON "BATTLEMENT" OF AUTOBOT C
dialogues.text: he watches...

dialogues.speaker: THE DECEPTICON ATTACK
dialogues.text: Megatron, Insecticons, Constructicons, and other Deceptic forces attack the city from the sky and ground.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: transforms to humanoid and runs toward...... ... Three new Autobots, ARCEE, a lovely female Autobot of about Hot Rod's age, SPRINGER, a very muscular and bantering "Indiana Jones" type Autobot and ULTRA MAGNUS, the large and soldierly City Commander. PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ultra Magnus.....a cursory evaluation of Decepticon capability indicates a distinct tactical deficit! ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In other words, Perceptor... SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (translating) We're outnumbered! He turns and FIRES from his hip.

dialogues.speaker: DIRGE IN JET MODE
dialogues.text: Zooms in to strafe as... SPRINGER'S BLAST... ...Explodes on his wing tip.

dialogues.speaker: SPRINGER, ULTRA MAGNUS AND OTHERS
dialogues.text: as Decepticon BOMBS AND LASER FIRE pour in on the City. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Springer, Arcee, transform Autobot City!

dialogues.speaker: AND ARCEE
dialogues.text: STARSCREAM (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pathetic fools! STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRANSFORMS and hovers in robot mode, firing all around them as they... ..dive for the switch and pull it down.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no escape...Uuuuh! Just then, the floor of the courtyard STARTS TRANSFORMING - - the center line of the floor snaps shut like the halves of a gigantic steel shelled clam, trapping Starscream's foot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agggggggh!     My foot!

dialogues.speaker: SPRINGER AND ARCEE
dialogues.text: as they make it through an archway which TRANSFORMS INTO STEEL SHIELD as they run through

dialogues.speaker: ON STARSCREAM
dialogues.text: He struggles to get free before he is crunched by the sti transforming city. In the nick of time, he shoots a "shoe horn" like projection from his wrist and pulls his boot free, then... ...dodges away. ... The "clam" shape RETRAC COMPLETELY and more armored shielding SLIDES INTO PLACE T COVER where the Courtyard was. He winces in mid-air and f away as the city continues to transform to a fortress bel

dialogues.speaker: THE TRANSFORMING CITY
dialogues.text: The towers and buildings of the city, picot and retract.. withdrawing like periscopes, turning and vanishing into steel shield coverings. ON MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he FLIES OVER SCENE, BLASTING this way and that, shouting MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Breach their defenses! ON INSECTICONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: who are trailing Megatron, attack the fast CLOSING CITY, trying to GNAW AND DEVOUR their way through the PORTS and BRIDGES leading inside. KICKBACK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Chewing on jamb of doorway near bridge) Delicious, eh Shrapnel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (CHEWING on draw-bridge to City)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little heavy on the electrons. Electrons.

dialogues.speaker: KUP, HOT ROD AND DANIEL
dialogues.text: as Kup and Hot Rod are racing down mountain toward the transforming city's drawbridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Insecticons are in our way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong!   They're our way in!   Yaaaaaaay- hah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod speeds up, passes Kup and... ... rides up and over Kickback's back, using it like a stunt driver's ramp to... ... hurtle across the open space between Kickback and the doorway into the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Shrapnel looks up and reacts... ...Kup hurtles up and over Kickback's back just as Kickback is starting to rise to see what knocked him face down onto the bridge in the first place. ... Kup goes SAILING OT OVER OPEN SPACE between Kickback's back and the doorway into the city- -clobbering Shrapnel, who is in the way and landing on the city doorstep, driving in as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: transforms, shutting down with metal shields with a "clank" sound as Kickback and Shrapnel both leap at is to... ... bite Kup and Hot Rod and instead BREAK THEIR TEETH on steel door, falling face down with a grunt as LAST BITS OF CITY TRANSFORM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Kup and Hot Rod roll in and TRANSFORM where Ultra Magn is waiting for them with Perceptor.   Other Autobots are moving into battle stations in the b.g. and ALARMS SOUND. Daniel looks on in awe. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sternly) You can explain your security violation later, Hot Rod! Now, man your battle station. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have to explain my so called violation to you or anyone... KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tugs him along roughly) He said "later!" Kup moves OFF with Hot Rod and Daniel.

dialogues.speaker: BLASTER ON FORTIFIED " CROWS NEST" LOOKOUT TOWER
dialogues.text: The "Crows Nest" has windows all around and Blaster's sea rotates so he can watch action and broadcast battle repor like a Top 40 Deejay. Perceptor climbs up ladder into "Cr Nest" from lower level. As Blaster speaks, we see Decepti FIRING at the windows of the Crows Nest but the bursts explode harmlessly against the glass BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lookout and shout! Yow! Explosions rock the Crows Nest. Blaster swivels around and tilts to see...

dialogues.speaker: INSECTICONS
dialogues.text: Chewing on armor plating at the lower edge of the fortifi transformed city. BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: activates turret type LASER CANNON BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gonna lay some slugs on those overweight bugs! (FIRES Laser Cannon)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: CANNON SWIVELS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LASER BLAST cooks out and we FOLLOW IT OFF SCREEN to... THE INSECTICONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as a Laser BLAST hurls Bombshell up and out of sight and causes Shrapnel and Kickback to get sucked into the vacuum. BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perceptor joins him. BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (joyful at his direct hit) I'm talkin' hits here, Autobuddies! Hits with a capital "aitch" like in Hard, Heavy and... (sees Perceptor) Hey, Perceptor, what's shakin' other than this fortress? BLASTS of enemy fire continue to rock the crows nest as Perceptor answers PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blaster, Ultra Magnus sends orders to contact Optimus Prime for reinforcements. BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright! Cover your receptors, Perceptor! Blaster transforms to ghetto blaster mode and broadcasts VISIBLE waves... THE WAVES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: rise and expand into space BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Optimus Prime... Do you read me? The Decepticons are blitzing Autobot City. We're really takin' a pounding. Don't know how much longer we can hold out.

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON LEADING ASSAULT ON TRANSFORMED AUTOBOT CITY
dialogues.text: He is FIRING at ARMORED DOOR, trying to melt through when reacts to SOUND of Blaster's broadcast for help, stops, a looks up at CROWS NEST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soundwave!     Jam that transmission. ON SOUNDWAVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOUNDWAVE moves forward and starts heaving CASSETTES upwards toward Blaster's Crows Nest position. SOUNDWAVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rumble! Frenzy! Ravage! Ratbat! Eject! Operation: interference. ON CASSETTES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as they transform and attack the crows nest. ON RUMBLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he starts PILE DRIVER MOTION on Crows Nest windows RUMBLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First we crack the shell.    Then we crack the nuts inside.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE CROWS NEST
dialogues.text: as Blaster and Perceptor see Rumble and others and react. Blaster stops broadcasting. BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got Cassette Critters knockin' on the window! ON RUMBLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he CRACKS THROUGH GLASS and he and others swarm in and attack Perceptor who tries to beat them away PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run, Blaster! Save yourself! BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way. Two can play! ON BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he spews out CASSETTES which TRANSFORM into CUBBIE, a lion, STRIPES, a tiger, STINGER, a scorpion and BOLTS, a small, tough robot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sic 'em!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ON RUMBLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Cubbie takes him down by the foot, turning him over and over ON STRIPES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he SNAPS at Ratbat who screams and darts, trying to escape as we move to

dialogues.speaker: STINGER AND BOLTS
dialogues.text: as Bolts swats Frenzy into Stinger who JABS Stinger into Frenzy making him yowl and run.

dialogues.speaker: PERCEPTOR AND BLASTER
dialogues.text: As they fight Decepticons. PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you got through to Prime? BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's hope so! Cause if I didn't we're gonna look like burnt out toaster ovens!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The city shows gaps, dents, smoking holes and Decepticons continue to pump fire into it and get back sporadic retur fire from inside as... ... Megatron moves INTO SHOT and f

dialogues.speaker: THE SCREEN
dialogues.text: MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constructicons merge for the kill!

dialogues.speaker: IN "PILLBOX" LIKE GUN EMPLACEMENT IN CITY'S ARMORED WAL
dialogues.text: Where Springer and Arcee clear the twisted remains of Aut defenders away from a CATAPULT LIKE TORPEDO LAUNCHER.

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH LAUNCHER PORT
dialogues.text: we see the mountain where the Decepticons are getting rea for the final charge. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great! Megatron's making his big push and we can't even push... (struggling to turn Catapult around to re-aim it) ...back!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Arcee starts to push beside him.

dialogues.speaker: THE HUGE CATAPULT
dialogues.text: moves slowly as we CHANGE ANGLE and Kup, Hot Rod and Dani ENTER SHOT. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep at it, Springer, lad! Help's at hand! (to Hot Rod) Together now! Hot Rod joins the others in pushing the huge Catapult int firing position. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: also leans against it, his small legs churning. THE CATAPULT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: starts moving easily now.

dialogues.speaker: ON ARCEE BESIDE HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Pushing on the busted catapult. ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pushing, manages to speak to Hot Rod. She likes him but doesn't want to go too far) I was afraid you'd be trapped outside the city walls. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (likes her, too, but tries to be cool and collected) Hey, I wasn't worried for a micro-second, Arcee! ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (enjoying letting him have it) Then you probably didn't understand the situation. Before Hot Rod can react, Kup steps back from repositioned Catapult KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That did it! DANIEL AT LAUNCHER PORT (Opening in "pillbox" through whi the Catapult will fire)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup, Hot Rod! Look! (he points)

dialogues.speaker: THE CONSTRUCTICONS
dialogues.text: as they start linking themselves together into enormous DEVASTATOR. KUP (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devastator! ON DEVASTATOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he rises up and starts FIRING, HAMMERING, TEARING AWAY at metal shields which create armored walls of the transformed City.

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDE MEGATRON, STARSCREAM, DIRGE, ET, AL
dialogues.text: as they line up behind Devastator, FIRING INTO THE CITY, ready to follow Devastator inside when he has torn the "r off.

dialogues.speaker: ON SPRINGER, ARCEE, HOT ROD, KUP AT CATAPULT
dialogues.text: as Springer LOADS TORPEDOES ONTO CATAPULT LIKE SLING SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got better things to do today than die. (he FIRES Catapult)

dialogues.speaker: CATAPULT
dialogues.text: as it HURLS FLAMING TORPEDO BOMBS one after the other out launch port and we FOLLOW THEM TO MEGATRON AND OTHER DECEPTICONS waiting for Devastator to open the way as a succession of torpedo-bombs explode, knocking them aside, some of the Torpedo-Bombs strike... DEVASTATOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and explode harmlessly as Devastator continues to grunt and tear off armored layers of the city. He grabs Hot Rod and Kup and starts to crush them. ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Optimus Prime's Space Shuttle hurtles in.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE SPACE SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dinobots.    Destroy Devastator! GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhhhh! Me Grimlock love challenge! Dinobots, transform! DINOBOTS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: transform into humanoid mode, and, with Grimlock at the front... ...fly out of the shuttle in wedge formation, blasting in unison. FOLLOW DINOBOTS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In as they transform again and, in dino mode, swoop over to Devastator... DEVASTATOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roars towards the Dinobots. THEIR BATTLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shakes the Earth... ...buckling City walls, menacing the Autobots inside. Rod and Kup are released during the struggle.

dialogues.speaker: THE DINOBOTS
dialogues.text: As they try to destroy Devastator... ... Their strength i more than matched and soon they are overwhelmed by him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prime stands outside the dented shuttle with Sunstreaker Hound. As he talks he shoots at a swarm of Decepticons wh battle their way towards him. PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Megatron must be stopped. (pause)

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON
dialogues.text: The Decepticon leader stands a hundred yards away, vanish and reappearing with the shifting waves of Generic Decepticons that charge back and forth. PRIME (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No matter the cost.

dialogues.speaker: PRIME'S CHARGE
dialogues.text: Optimus Prime leader and hero of the Autobots charges int certain doom. As he battles his way through the Deceptico we HEAR an inspiring anthem of courage, strength and triu like "Eye of the Tiger". This theme will reprise during t film when the Autobots are battling at impossible odds. H charges headlong into the Decepticon forces which separat him from Megatron. Decepticons fire on him, but he takes the shots, and... Spinning and whirling like the Sundance Kid, he takes a lot out. Then, Decepticons attempt to blo his charge and Prime... ... Like a powerback, transforms Truck Mode and barrels into them, sending Decepticons fly around like shards of glass hit by a .45. ... finally, he is engulfed by an incoming swarm, and it looks like his attack is foiled. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he commands his troops. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their defenses are broken.    Let the slaughter begin. Then he turns and sees... MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prime!? PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: smashing through a wall of lesser Decepticons. PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One shall stand, one shall fall.

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON
dialogues.text: his eyes blazing with hatred. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why throw away your life so recklessly?

dialogues.speaker: ON OPTIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: Dirge takes a sneaky leap at him... Optimus stiffarms him with a shuddering clank... ...then turns him upside down one hand and... ...drives him headfirst into the rocky ground, letting him crumple and fall. OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a question you should ask yourself. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hurls himself at Optimus Prime... .... both tumble into the walls of the City... ...denting the walls and causing the electronic panels inside to short circuit, surrounding them with a fiery nimbus of crackling electrical energy. Ultra Magnus in car carrier mode barrels out of city carr several Autobots. He and the others transform into robot mode and fire lasers at the Decepticons.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD, KUP, DANIEL, ARCEE, BLASTER, PERCEPT
dialogues.text: fighting their way to the battle of the titans. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to save Prime! Punching... KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's his fight, lad!   Stay away. Shooting.. ...And charging.

dialogues.speaker: OPTIMUS AND MEGATRON
dialogues.text: Megatron attempts to kick Prime in the throat... ...Prime catches his foot, twists it... ... and hurls Megatron backwards into a metal pile. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: grabs a jagged, spearlike piece of steel and hurls it at PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The steel "spear" pierces his side and sticks in him as... ... he charges Megatron, ...dodging shots from Megatron's gun to... ...deliver a huge UPPERCUT which... ...lifts Megatron into the air so high that... ... (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: PRIME (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: his head butts sharply against overhanging concrete balcony, mashing him down... MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lands and stealthily slips a laser dagger from his boot, turning and slashing at... PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he comes for him, tearing... ...a gash across Prime's midsection, which spews smoke and sparks and... ... dropping Prime to one knee. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gloating) Farewell, Prime! As Megatron hurls the laser dagger as we CHANGE ANGLE to OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he lifts chunks of broken concrete and catches the laser dagger on it, tossing it aside as he lunges at- MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: who claws his fingers and digs them into Prime's eyes MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll rip out your optics! Optimus grabs Megatron's clawed hand in one of his hands, twists it in see-sawing test of strength which... Optimus wins in a judo toss which sends Megatron - - skidding face first through steel rubble, in a shower of sparks until he crashes into the side of the city.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He dispatches a Decepticon and turns to Prime. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's showing him, Optimus! KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: knocks two Decepticons on their tails and turns. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finish him off, Prime!   Do it now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he spots a gun on the ground ahead of him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No more, Optimus Prime!    Grant me mercy, I beg of you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Optimus Prime warily moves out to look down at the cowering Megatron, keeping him in his gun sights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You who are without mercy now plead for it. I thought you were made of sterner stuff, Megatron!

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD
dialogues.text: as he sees Megatron go for the gun and leaps out to grapp with him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the way, Hot Rod.

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: as Hot Rod grabs for the Blaster - - Megatron quickly get Hot Rod in a headlock and using Hot Rod as a shield, gets gun and...

dialogues.speaker: ON OPTIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: his midsection now glowing and smoking, a huge hole where Blaster has struck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: firing blaster again and again

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fall!   Fall! Megatron tosses Hot Rod aside like a rag doll and stands above the dying Prime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would have waited an eternity for this. Crawl, slave! On your knees!

dialogues.speaker: ON OPTIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: as he gathers his remaining strength and smashes Megatron with both fists clasped together. OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasping painfully) Never! He bashes in Megatron's torso casing, fracturing the side which split, spilling wires, fuses, lights, circuitry. Megatron falls! Prime falls to his knees, tries to rise, collapses to his side and falls slowly back. HOT ROD runs over to him. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Optimus!    Forgive me!

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON
dialogues.text: Starscream and other Decepticons stand over the smoking b STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic, filled with false sympathy) How do you feel, Mighty Megatron? (he kicks Megatron) MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weakly clutching at Starscream's hand, gasping) Enshrine me! STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (drops Megatron's hand coldly, calls to other Decepticons) Take this scrap to Cybertron! Astrotrain, transform and get us out of here!

dialogues.speaker: ASTROTRAIN
dialogues.text: as he MOVES ONTO SCENE in Humanoid mode, showing battle b and scars. Then, he converts to train mode, and rolls thr a crowd of generic Decepticons, crushing many under his wheels, as he makes his way towards Starscream.

dialogues.speaker: THE EXODUS
dialogues.text: Ramjet, Thrust, Dirge, the Constructicons, Soundwave and cassettes, et.al. run towards Astrotrain.

dialogues.speaker: KUP AND ARCEE
dialogues.text: They fight for a moment, then they notice their attackers beating feet... ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Decepticons are retreating. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prime did it. He turned the tide! He shoots (O.S.) into...

dialogues.speaker: A CROWD OF DECEPTICONS
dialogues.text: Who fight each other for a place on the shuttle.

dialogues.speaker: STARSCREAM
dialogues.text: dragging Megatron by one leg, callously disregarding the Megatron's head and upper body BUMP AND GET KNOCKED from dragging. THE AUTOBOTS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: fire after them, closing ranks on the shuttle, and pouring shots into the melee.

dialogues.speaker: ASTROTRAIN
dialogues.text: Decepticons make way for Starscream as he tosses the near lifeless Megatron into the shuttle and gets in. Then, standing at the door, he kicks other Decepticons away. STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrotrain, take off.

dialogues.speaker: ASTROTRAIN
dialogues.text: The shuttle takes off, leaving a number of generic Decepticons behind, who immediately raise their hands upo realizing that they are surrounded by Autobots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he lies on an improvised bier-like platform, a profusion of electricity discharging tubes and "plasma" bottle devices hooked up to his arms and into his gaping middle wound.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SCANNERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: emit bleeps and show oscilloscopic patterns but sounds and wave patterns are steadily growing weaker and weaker. PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is bent over Prime, in microscope mode, examining him... He then transforms and straightens up, his voice strained and cracking with emotion. PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I fear the wounds are... (he can't finish what he's going to say)

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD, KUP, ARCEE, DANIEL
dialogues.text: AND OTHER AUTOBOTS as they react. OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (using remaining strength to makes himself heard) Autobots...do not grieve... Soon, I shall be one with the matrix. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a flash of hope) Prime! (looks off at Prime)

dialogues.speaker: OPTIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: His head is turned so all assembled can see. His eyes fli weakly, his voice RUMBLES with overtone of vast weariness resignation OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reaches up with right hand with great effort) Ultra Magnus! It is to you, old friend, I shall pass the matrix as it was passed to me ....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he steps forward unwillingly, mixed grief and surprise his face MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prime, I'm just a soldier.   I'm not worthy.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasping) Nor was I, but one day, an Autobot shall rise from our ranks and use the powers of the Matrix to light our darkest hour.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS AND OPTIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: Optimus Prime is tilted into half sitting position by oth Autobots manipulating the platform as Ultra Magnus grasps hand with great emotion OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (voice failing, pressing on with it) Until that day... Until all are one... Continue the struggle... (sags, gasp hanging on) Transfer the Matrix of Leadership.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS AND OPTIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: A distraught Ultra Magnus nods, reaches out with free han and points his forefinger at Optimus Prime's chest. Then, pressing a button on Prime's chest, a small, secret doorw opens, and we see something extremely bright glowing in there. Ultra Magnus, nearly blinded by the intense light, reaches in, and lifts out --

dialogues.speaker: THE AUTOBOT LEADERSHIP MATRIX,
dialogues.text: -- and holds it for a moment in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: The bright light, which emanates from the perfect crystal seems to blind everybody and washes all color out of the shot. Then, slowly, Ultra Magnus moves it into his own ch closes the door, and the light is gone, save for a moment and extremely powerful glow from his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: ON KUP, HOT ROD, ARCEE AND PERCEPTOR
dialogues.text: They are all full of great sorrow.

dialogues.speaker: ON PRIME
dialogues.text: All of his lights go out, including his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: Rotating satellite dishes on the surface spark with electricity. Dissolve inside Unicron to reveal scenes of Prime's death and the passing of the Matrix to Ultra Magn playing on various monitors. Some of the scenes are in sl motion, others are sped up. The effect should be eerie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it whizzes through the Solar System. ASTROTRAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jettison some weight, or I'll never make it to Cybertron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship is packed with living, dead and wounded Deceptic Starscream addresses them like an Athenian Orator. STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fellow Decepticons, Astrotrain has requested that we lighten our burden!

dialogues.speaker: BONECRUSHER
dialogues.text: BONECRUSHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In that case, I say it's survival of the fittest. STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I hear a second on that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aye! STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And against?

dialogues.speaker: NAY
dialogues.text: STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ayes' have it! A robotic hand flips a switch, and chaos ensues. Strong Decepticons start heave-hoing the weaker ones out into sp

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat it!     Spare me!

dialogues.speaker: STARSCREAM AND MEGATRON
dialogues.text: Starscream picks him up and holds him up by the door. STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) Oh, how it grieves me to do this. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, I still function! Starscream kicks him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanna bet?

dialogues.speaker: MEGATRON IN SPACE
dialogues.text: He shakes his fist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of the weak Decepticons is tossed, and the other dust off their hands. STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, as Megatron has, how shall we say - departed. I nominate myself as the new leader.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE CONSTRUCTICONS
dialogues.text: SCRAPPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Constructicons form Devastator, the most powerful robot. We should rule. SOUNDWAVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constructicons inferior.   Soundwave superior. BONECRUSHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you calling inferior. HOOK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody would follow an uncharismatic bore like you.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The five cassettes: BUZZSAW, FRENZY, RUMBLE, RAVAGE AND LASERBEAK pop from his chest transform, and prepare to attack. RUMBLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, nobody calls Soundwave uncrazmatic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah!     Let's kick tailgate. THE CONSTRUCTICONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: try to form Devastator, but... HOOK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Constructicons, unite!

dialogues.speaker: RUMBLE AND FRENZY
dialogues.text: quake the ship so hard with their pile-driver arms that, the help of Laserbeak, Buzzsaw and Ravage, they keep knoc the Constructicons off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way! Over the battle. BLITZWING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am a triple changer. I am worth any two of you. I should run things.

dialogues.speaker: DIRGE
dialogues.text: DIRGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Death comes to anyone who crosses me. He attacks Blitzwing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is flying a very wobbly course past Pluto... ASTROTRAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop squabbling or we're gonna crash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Megatron and the other dented, dinged and dead Decepticon bodies float through space. we follow the wailing Megatro and the others down to:

dialogues.speaker: THE SURFACE OF UNICRON
dialogues.text: littering the otherwise beautiful technological expanse. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome, Megatron. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking around) Who said that? UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Unicron. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show yourself! UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have summoned you here for a purpose. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody summons Megatron! UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then it pleases me to be the first. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: State your business. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring me the Autobot Matrix. It is the one thing - the only thing that can stand in my way. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have nothing to fear. I have already crushed Optimus Prime with my bare hands. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You exaggerate. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The point is, he is dead!   And the Matrix died with him. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. It has been passed to their new leader. Get it for me. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why should I? What's in it for me?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your bargaining posture is highly dubious, but very well, I will provide you with a new body, and new troops to command. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And... UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And nothing. You belong to me now. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I belong to nobody. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps I misjudged you. Proceed on your way to oblivion. The Mist appears and starts to dissolve Megatron. MEGATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pleading) No, no. I accept your terms.   I accept! UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent! Behold - Galvatron! X-ray images: wiring, circuitry, etc. flash on and off as a new and larger being starts to form, changing from dented Megatron to a huge, new creation: Galvatron.

dialogues.speaker: THE TRANSFORMATION
dialogues.text: ends in a blinding flash and Galvatron - who still resemb Megatron - laughs and flexes his muscles and stretches. H voice is deeper, different from Megatron's GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Long live Galvatron! UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And these shall be your minions...

dialogues.speaker: OTHER DECEPTICONS
dialogues.text: Their bodies are turned from battered Decepticons to...

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SCOURGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCOURGE (Sweep character) is bearded, fanged and ferocious looking and as soon as he has been CREATED, he roars and stretches and an ARRAY OF SIMILAR CREATURES - smaller and all wearing dark and matching uniforms - are INSTANTLY CREATED FROM OTHERS behind him UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scourge, the tracker....and his huntsmen...the Sweeps....

dialogues.speaker: ON CYCLONUS
dialogues.text: CYCLONUS is CREATED and then his "armada" of similar, but smaller and similarly colored and clad creatures are form UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cyclonus, the warrior...and his armada.....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To Cybertron! He roars with a mad power-rush, gets into Cyclonus (who w be his personal ship) and leading the armada, takes off f the distant stars. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loudly proclaiming over the scene) Bring me the Autobot matrix! DURING UNICRON'S COMMAND we CHANGE ANGLE TO SHOW

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: as Galvatron and his newly created force FLY UP AND AWAY great speed. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will rip open Autobot after Autobot until it is yours, Unicron.

dialogues.speaker: THE DECEPTICON HALL OF HEROES
dialogues.text: This is the closest thing the Decepticons have to a thron room. It is a massive, circular room with tombs of old leaders, and a raised area where Starscream stands.

dialogues.speaker: STARSCREAM AND OTHERS
dialogues.text: The Decepticon plane looks slightly ridiculous with cloak his shoulders and Thrust and Ramjet at his side, weapons high, but ready for action should anybody question Starscream's rule. In front of him stands Astrotrain hold a huge Metallic CROWN over his head. OTHER DECEPTICONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in neat ranks but their grim expressions show their displeasure. STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (preening) Get on with the ceremony! Dirge and others react to EERIE SOUNDS and look up and off. Starscream looks where others are looking and reacts.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON AND HIS FORCES
dialogues.text: as they descend in Hall of Heroes and Galvatron moves out confront Starscream

dialogues.speaker: ON STARSCREAM AND GALVATRON
dialogues.text: STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who disrupts my coronation? GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coronation? This is bad comedy! STARSCREAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Megatron, is that you? GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's a clue!

dialogues.speaker: HIS P.O.V -GALVATRON
dialogues.text: as Galvatron transforms into cannon, FIRING A HUGE BURST STARSCREAM as BLAST hits him. For a moment, he retains hi shape then piece by piece, he falls apart. Only a pair of boots remain on the floor. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He transforms back to robot mode and confronts other Decepticons boastfully. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will anyone else attempt to fill his shoes?

dialogues.speaker: AL.
dialogues.text: PAN for their reactions as they ponder for a brief beat a then exchange looks/

dialogues.speaker: DECEPTICONS
dialogues.text: (AD LIB)

dialogues.speaker: LONG LIVE...
dialogues.text: (they look at each other) What did he say his name was. H didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Galvatron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bit by bit, we see new    sections of the planet being generated.    Then, the sinister mist we saw at    the beginning of the film starts pouring    out. He's about to do the big munch on..

dialogues.speaker: PUSH IN TO
dialogues.text: Standing outside the "netted" complex, looking off at... UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A strange, LOUD HUM fills the air and the ground heaves and SHAKES beneath their feet JAZZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd that come from?! CLIFFJUMPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who cares? I'm more worried about where it's going!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: JAZZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on communicator device) Talk to me, Earth! We got a situation out here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Autobot City is almost rebuilt, and we see Kup and Hot Ro working with other Autobots to move large panels into position. In the background, two huge SPACE SHUTTLES are almost completed and Ultra Magnus is directing the work. During this ESTABLISHING SERIES OF SHOTS, we HEAR JAZZ'S

dialogues.speaker: VOICE OVER
dialogues.text: JAZZ (V.O.-FILTER)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger me. Wilco me. Anything?    Hello. Hello Earth.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE OF LARGE SPACE SHUTTLE UNDER CONSTRUCTION
dialogues.text: Springer and Arcee fit a hull section in place with Danie motioning to them, directing the action. BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reacts to muffled transmission from Jazz. BLASTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm pickin' up a faint signal! BLASTER TRANSFORMS to blaster mode and Jazz's VOICE is broadcast loud and clear causing Springer, Arcee, and Daniel to react JAZZ (V.O.-ON FILTER)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Jazz. I gi-normous weird lookin' planet just showed up in the suburbs of Cybertron.... CLIFFJUMPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And it's attack... STATIC obscures the message ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jazz!   Cliffjumper!

dialogues.speaker: THE FIRST MOON
dialogues.text: is covered by Unicron's energy field, and slowly seems to dissolve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: a great maw works more intensely crushing bits of the pla

dialogues.speaker: JAZZ AND CLIFFJUMPER ON THAT MOON
dialogues.text: as quakes, tremors and cyclonic winds toss and tear at al structures on the moon and the energy field closes in on and Cliffjumper - who, using handholds every step of the et into

dialogues.speaker: AN ESCAPE POD VEHICLE
dialogues.text: as Unicron looms larger, larger, the energy field seems t dissolve the landscape. JAZZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got ...to....blast free....if we can..... They get in and start retro blasters, the flame of blasters whirling in wild winds as moon is engulfed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLIFFJUMPER (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ignition and.... SOUNDS of torrential winds, quakes, etc as moon is quickl becoming Unicron's lunch. JAZZ (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit it!

dialogues.speaker: ON ESCAPE POD
dialogues.text: as it BLASTS OFF and away from Unicron with an EXPLOSION. a moment, it looks like they are going to get clean away, but... ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly it is pulled deep into Unicron.

dialogues.speaker: THE MOON
dialogues.text: as Moon shatters like a hollow egg and is sucked complete into Unicron's maw which closes around it with a snap.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON IN DECEPTICON HALL OF HEROES
dialogues.text: Silence. No more winds. No more movement. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How dare Unicron?! (defiant) Cybertron and all it's moons are mine!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: His body starts to twist making him writhe in pain powerl to resist SCOURGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But remember, WE belong to HIM! GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasping for breath, writhing, nods) I....will obey, Unicron! Decepticons, to Earth! The torture stops and Galvatron clutches his throat and tries to regain his composure as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has a portable communication device. Spike and Bumble be seen on it. Springer, Kup, the Dinobots, Blurr, and Ho Rod look on amid general gathering of Autobots. Arcee hol Daniel up on her shoulder so he can see. Blaster is in b. SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like a terrible nightmare, Ultra Magnus. BUMBLEBEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This thing - this juggernaut just ripped the first moon to shreds. SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And it's heading this way.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: BUMBLEBEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll try 'n slow it down... SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you'd better get here fast because... Suddenly, static obscures the transmission. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad! ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Autobots, prepare to board the shuttles. This new menace is more dangerous than all the Decepticons put together. Somehow we must destroy it before it devours Cybertron. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what about my dad? He's on the moon between that monster and Cybertron. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel, I'll do everything I can for Spike. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what are we going to do when we get there? If that thing crunches moons, it'll make short work of us. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe the Matrix can stop it. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right! It can. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you know about it lad? HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just a feeling. Hot Rod looks up and sees something. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look!

dialogues.speaker: ANGLE ON ATTACKING DECEPTICONS
dialogues.text: Decepticon ships seem to dive from nowhere to attack the Autobots. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To the shuttles!!!

dialogues.speaker: DECEPTICON JETS
dialogues.text: Galvatron is in the lead. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no escape. I, Galvatron will crush you just as the magnificent Megatron crushed Prime! ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you'll die trying just like Megatron! Ultra Magnus fires Laser and hits Galvatron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: aaaaaaaah!     Autobot cur!! CYCLONUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to gut Ultra Magnus for you? GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are plenty of Autobots for you. Ultra Magnus is mine!

dialogues.speaker: THE BATTLE
dialogues.text: Decepticons dive on fleeing Autobots.

dialogues.speaker: ARCEE AND DANIEL
dialogues.text: As Daniel looks up and Arcee moves over to him protective Hot Rod looks at Arcee in the same way she is looking at Daniel. ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay close to me, Daniel... HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Arcee) And you better stay close to me... Arcee pulls Hot Rod toward her before he gets hit by laser

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you'd better stay close to me. Blurr is trying to get Grimlock into Shuttle with the rest of the Dinobots as Decepticon FIRE COMES IN ALL AROUND. Grimlock is like a "spooked horse" refusing to be shut in the barn. BLURR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pleading with him, shoving him, talking very, very rapidly) Nice Dino, good, Dino, sweet Dino! Won't you step into the nice spaceship for Blurr? Please, pretty please. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sticking head out past struggling Blurr) Me, Grimlock, not "nice Dino!" Me bash brains!

dialogues.speaker: SEVERAL DECEPTICON JETS COMING AT HIM
dialogues.text: GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gives FIRE BREATHING BLAST AT JETS as they go by STRAFING THE

dialogues.speaker: THE DECEPTICON JETS
dialogues.text: as Grimlock's BLAST SETS THEM ALL ON FIRE and they spin i one another as we CHANGE ANGLE TO ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Kup, Hot Rod and Arcee MOVE INTO SCENE

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND HIM
dialogues.text: ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup, Hot Rod. Get the Dinobots out of here!

dialogues.speaker: KUP AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: as they run into Dinobot Shuttle, retracting their entry in

dialogues.speaker: HAIL OF FIRE FROM SCOURGE AND HIS SWEEPS.
dialogues.text: ON SCOURGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he TRANSFORMS to Humanoid mode and shouts orders, FIRING AT Blurr who BLURRS PAST and then at Arcee who also SHIPS BY SCOURGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No survivors!

dialogues.speaker: IN DINOBOT SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: as Hot Rod squeezes past   Sludge Swoop, and Slag to join who is already at control deck where Grimlock sticks his down to look out the window. Kup shoves him aside. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This reminds me of the battle on Alpha 9, when the Petro-Rabbits were...(annoyed) Grimlock, get your noodle out of my face! (starts throwing switches) GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, Grimlock, love Kup's war stories! KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're living one now! (to Hot Rod) Engage the boosters for Cybertron's sake! Hot Rod nods and quickly passes his hand over bank of SWITCHES all of which GLOW AND PULSE with the action. ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as DECEPTICON FIREBALL COMES UP and SPLATTERS AGAINST WINDOW, sending tongues of fire running across the glass behind Hot Rod's head HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got 'em!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grimlock still trying to stick his face in the control pa as Kup works furiously and more DECEPTICON FIRE HITS THE GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Kup) Tell Grimlock about Petro-Rabbits again.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (muttering, using joystick) I'll give you Petro-Rabbits. Contact! The Shuttle lurches and shakes

dialogues.speaker: SHUTTLE WITH DINOBOTS
dialogues.text: It takes off amidst a hail of Decepticon fire. HOT ROD (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yaaaaaaaaho! We're airborne! GRIMLOCK (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groooooowwwwwrrrr!

dialogues.speaker: ON CYCLONUS AND HIS "WING" OF PLANES
dialogues.text: as they bank down toward RISING SHUTTLE FAR BELOW. CYCLONUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vaporize them! Jets streak down toward upward rising Shuttle as we

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER PART OF SHUTTLE LAUNCH AREA
dialogues.text: Springer springs onto scene with Daniel, Ultra Magnus and Perceptor are guarding the entry ramp, firing at Deceptic SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Daniel) Looks like we're shipmates, squirt!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right! SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But if you get space sick, you're gonna walk home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry! Blurr blurs up ramp. Arcee reaches the ramp as the shuttl takes off horizontally.

dialogues.speaker: SPRINGER
dialogues.text: as he reaches down for Arcee.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jump. ON ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: still going up the ramp while the shuttle slowly leaves the ground. Just as the wind and gravity are about to knock her off, jumps up and...

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: Springer grabs her hand and pulls her in, narrowly avoidi barrage Daniel is watching, terrified. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was close! Concussion of Decepticon hit rocks the shuttle SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Believe it or not, this is the fun part.

dialogues.speaker: IN "COCKPIT" OF ULTRA MAGNUS' SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: Ultra Magnus is at control deck with Perceptor as they "t for launch and we see oncoming Decepticon jets firing at ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time to preheat....Can this ship take it? PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With an accelerated ignition procedure the ceramic housings might create a magnetic flux. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (baffled) What? SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (ENTERING SHOT, reaches in and pushes joystick forward) He says "go for it!" Powerful rockets ignite, and the shuttle   SHAKES with th sound.

dialogues.speaker: RUNWAY
dialogues.text: The Shuttle's rockets surge, melting the pursuing    Swee the Shuttle hits the sky and soars upwards.

dialogues.speaker: ON DINOBOT SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: Cyclonus' Jets fire on it, as we CHANGE ANGLE ON ULTRA MAGNUS' SHUTTLE It roars up behind Cyclonus' jets and overtakes and smashes through them, scattering them as it pulls up alongside the Dinobot shuttle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grimlock is peering out of the side ports. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: gives the thumbs up gesture. ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INCLUDING Ultra Magnus' shuttle through side port as Springer gives thumbs up signal in return and Daniel waves ON SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he turns and reacts, looking straight up and ahead SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It ought to be smooth sailin' from here on in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuse them! Astrotrain starts diving into upcoming Shuttles BLASTING AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Kup struggles to hold controls, his shuttle also ROCKI from direct hits KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (using intercom) Ultra Magnus...what next?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shuttle ROCKS WITH DIRECT HITS as Ultra Magnus struggles controls ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember what we did off Beta Four!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I remember it well.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE SHUTTLES
dialogues.text: They fire (O.S.) at...

dialogues.speaker: A LARGE ASTEROID
dialogues.text: With incredible precision, the rays strike the asteroid, splitting it in two parts.

dialogues.speaker: ONE OF THE ASTEROID HALVES
dialogues.text: It shoots through space and strikes another asteroid, whi breaks into several pieces, many of them angling back towards... GALVATRON'S SHIPS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: which swerve to avoid them as....

dialogues.speaker: THE OTHER ASTEROID PART
dialogues.text: Hits another moon or asteroid or general rock in space, doing the same thing... WIDEN SHOT to show that the piece are shooting around like pool balls after an incredibly violent break... ... zinging into each other... .... Narrowly missing Galvatron's ship... ... Filling space wi incredible amounts of Dust, lava from inside the moons, multi-colored gasses, explosions and generally making a m of space. (Note: think of this scene as the "Asteroids" video game.)

dialogues.speaker: THE AUTOBOT SHUTTLES
dialogues.text: As all of this is going on, they jam into hyperspace... . Corkscrewing and arcing off into the galaxy, leaving only blurred images of themselves as... GALVATRON'S SHIP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: emerges from the chaos.

dialogues.speaker: ON CYCLONUS
dialogues.text: CYCLONUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The explosions jammed my sensors. (pause) I have lost track of the Autobots!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it!! They did the same thing to me off Beta four!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Possible song - optimistic adventure with the suggestion that all dreams might not happen. as both shuttles soar majestically through the vast depth infinite space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Congratulations Autobots, we've lost 'em at least for a while. So rest up. We'll refuel on the Junk Planet and work out our battle plan there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup sits spinning yarns, leaning back in chair as Grimloc Sludge, Slag and Swoop lie, lounge, sit with chin on hand all listening like little kids to a bedtime story - in ra attention

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep, I remember the dust was so thick off Beta 4 had to use windshield wipers on your optic sensors....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impatiently) Me, Grimlock, know all about wipers! Want to hear good part of story!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beating wings rapidly, excitedly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good part, Kup! Tell Swoop good part!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (excitedly) (beating tail on Unh unh unh.... floor) Good part...tell ...tell...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Okay. The dust was really thick and then this gigantic Ick Yak...

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He is practicing sparring with a SPINNING AUTO-COMBATANT very high tech quintain with many arms, legs, and weapons that test the user's skills, and reflexes. Hot Rod wears sparring gauntlet, and holds a small LASER DAGGER and spe shield. As he lowers shield and reacts to Dinobot reactio to Kup's story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you think we have better things to do now than tell stories Kup?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like maybe figure out how we're gonna stay alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (ALL SHUSH HIM)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he is speaking, Auto-Combatant "sees" its opening and gives Hot Rod a swift kick in the rear, sending him flying (o.s.)

dialogues.speaker: THE AUTO COMBATANT
dialogues.text: Then hammers its fists on top of his head...

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Irked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Time out, for Cybertron's sake!

dialogues.speaker: ON AUTO-COMBATANT'S FACE
dialogues.text: as it sticks out a metal tongue and gives him a LOUD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Hot Rod    rises and draws his fist back to clobber th Combatant

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: AUTO COMBATANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mechanically, quickly) Time out, time out, time out! Suddenly, the shuttle rocks from impact and SPARKS and flames shoot out of large hole in wall

dialogues.speaker: ON ULTRA MAGNUS AT CONSOLE INTERCOM
dialogues.text: ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup! Raise your force fields at once! They're armed with.....

dialogues.speaker: ON GALVATRON ON "BRIDGE" OF FLAT TOP
dialogues.text: as he presses firing button ... ULTRA MAGNUS (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moleculon Missiles!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON'S CARRIER
dialogues.text: Particularly deadly looking missiles shoot out.

dialogues.speaker: THE DINOBOT SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: It zooms towards a whopper of a planet, surrounded by sev small moons. We will later learn that this planet is Quintesson, but for now, it's mysterious. The moleculon missiles streak after it like sidewinders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup and Hot Rod pilot the thing for all it's worth. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're closing on us! KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep, like the shrikebats of Dromedon! HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, how'd you beat them? KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying to remember...there were an awful lot of casualties that day...

dialogues.speaker: THE SHUTTLE AND MISSILES
dialogues.text: The missiles streak toward them.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KUP (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah, we inversed polarities. HOT ROD (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That'll tear the ship apart! KUP (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got a better idea?!! With that, the ship seems to stop, on a dime, in mid air! The missiles zoom past it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod watches wide-eyed, as Kup watches ahead warily, h on the controls. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, so you were right. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't run your programs until they're debugged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the moleculon missiles, reverse course and star coming back. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming back. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's just hope we've screwed up their trajectories.

dialogues.speaker: THE MISSILES
dialogues.text: The missiles sidewind towards them, then their paths cros and

dialogues.speaker: BOOOM
dialogues.text: Everything flashes white.

dialogues.speaker: THE DINOBOT SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whew!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup and Hot Rod look forward, their eyes, blinking, as if strained.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep, I thought we'd had it that time for sure.

dialogues.speaker: THE SHIP
dialogues.text: It sits next to a gigantic alien-made moon. Suddenly, a hatch opens and a massive grabber that looks like a lobst claw shoots out at it.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He sees the claw coming out of the viewscreen. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The claw snaps on the front of the ship, smashing the win and... ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: crushing the area between Hot Rod and Kup.

dialogues.speaker: SPACE
dialogues.text: As it explodes, flinging the Autobots inside down toward Quintesson's planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as they man control panel in cockpit. In the background, Blurr and Arcee work to patch other holes in hull and Dan helps them. Perceptor slowly plots coordinates on light-u table, oblivious to SHAKES AND ROCKINGS of their ship. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup and Hot Rod just bought it! ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't deal with that now.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
