dialogues.text: Face it, Magnus, the Decepticons 're gonna dog us until they see us dead! Ultra Magnus nods solemnly ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (cryptic) Then that's exactly what they're gonna see.

dialogues.speaker: THE DECEPTICON FLAT TOP AND CYCLONUS' ARMADA
dialogues.text: ON GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he works controls which eject more Moleculon Missiles.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS' SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: electrical outline envelopes it and there is a... ... blinding flash after which... .. remnants of the hull and superstructure explode toward camera and past camera accompanied by explosive sound and then, silence! ... Whe the shuttle had been there is now...nothing! Just loose asteroids and clouds of space dust CYCLONUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Autobots have been terminated! GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent. And soon we shall say the same of that infernal Unicron. Suddenly, Galvatron's body begins to twist, and he writhes in pain. GALVATRON (CONT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaah!   Take me to Unicron...Aaaah!

dialogues.speaker: THE HUGE FLAT TOP
dialogues.text: as it veers off and away from the space cloud, followed b Cyclonus' Armada. Hold for a beat, and then CLOSE IN on t dust cloud as... ... part of Ultra Magnus' shuttle flies the clear.

dialogues.speaker: THE COCKPIT
dialogues.text: Arcee, Perceptor, Springer, Blurr are crowded together in cramped remnant of cockpit as Daniel and Ultra Magnus sit the control deck

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did we have to detonate three- quarters of the ship?! SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seeing how they would have detonated four quarters, I think it was a good choice.

dialogues.speaker: SUDDEN SHUDDER AND THE SHIP DROPS
dialogues.text: SHARPLY, all holding on to each other and to any protruding handhold ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perceptor....can you still locate the Junk Planet? PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamma waves in this sector of space create marginal navigation probabilities, however..... (looks at Ultra Magnus) ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holds his head in his hands as Springer grimaces

dialogues.speaker: RESUME ON PERCEPTOR
dialogues.text: realizes he's overdoing it again, clears his throat PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahem.....yes I think I can.

dialogues.speaker: PLANET
dialogues.text: which we see as dim shadow on the edge of space

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small, falling object appears high above Quintesson and hurtles down, down, over and over until it is in view and see it is... HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: still cartwheeling down toward the planet below, trying to change the angle of his fall

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He plummets down through layers of atmosphere and continu to fall past shiny rock pinnacles of unusual construction we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Hot Rod falls into the sea, we CUT TO THE SILVERY ENER SEA Hot Rod sinks to the bottom where he collides with... a metallic reef, bounces, manages to right himself, shaki his head as he regains equilibrium, and... Then he transf into auto mode modified for undersea action and starts ri off as he calls through intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bubbling, filtered voice) Kup....Grimlock?   Slag!....Anybody? WE FOLLOW him through undersea world as he rounds a "corner" of the Reef Wall and reacts

dialogues.speaker: A HUGE, MECHANICAL 0 SQUID CREATURE
dialogues.text: The ROBOTOID SQUID is tearing Kup to pieces and tossing t pieces across the ocean floor with its silvery metal tentacles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup! He transforms and blasts...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: angrily streaks toward Hot Rod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fires at the Squid, but not stopping him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod's shot plinks off a couple of tentacles, but the squid keeps coming... ... Wraps his tentacles around Hot Rod and starts crushin ... Hot Rod looks like he's about to be crushed, but he.. ... Shoots ... Its hideous Optical Sensor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: releases a laser print ink stream which boils out in the water in a series of dots and "x" shapes and retreats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, I'm not coming after you.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lowers his head and blows blast of air through head-piece. The air blast clears the water, revealing Kup's head and torso half buried in the "sand"

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD AND KUP'S HEAD
dialogues.text: as hot Rod kneels HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup!   Say something!

dialogues.speaker: KUP'S HEAD
dialogues.text: as he turns head around to look up at Hot Rod and spits o mouthful of sand KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bubbling as he speaks) Fix me! HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, Kup....right away! Hot Rod rapidly

dialogues.speaker: KUP AND HOT ROD ON THE RED DESERT SHORE OF THE ENERGY SEA
dialogues.text: Kup stands impatiently while Hot Rod reassembles them. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...what do you think? Kup feels his elbow joint, twists his neck side to side and gets creaks and squeaks and moves legs in odd, creaky way as he is trying himself out. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a beat, then grimaces) There's a piece missing. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way.... (sifts through pile of SCRAP METAL PARTS lying at Kup's feet) See, this wasn't yours...it's some kind of prehistoric ion cruncher....and this doohickey looks like a funky energon funnel... and this...

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (moving up and back, bending arms and hands, CREAKING,

dialogues.speaker: CLUNKING, SQUEAKING
dialogues.text: Well, I still think I'm short a part! (sees Hot Rod hang his head) But all things considered, you did an amazing job, lad! Amazing! HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (brightening) Really? KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rotates arm rapidly) Yeah, you even got rid of a nasty burr on my rotator! Now, let's find the Dinos and get off this twisted planet! ON KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he transforms it's evident that a fender is misplaced and a wheel mounted improperly so it wobbles and he rides unevenly with much chugging and oil spewing KUP (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in vehicular mode) Of all the circuit glitched diode blowin' dim-wittery... I told you a part was missin'. we watch Hot Rod and Kup move off into the distance as we

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER PART OF QUINTESSON
dialogues.text: Kup and Hot Rod walk along a swampy, marshy area. Suddenl there are several loud gurgles, and we can see the shapes something terrible emerging through the muck. Hot Rod spi to fire, but Kup bats down his arm.

dialogues.speaker: SHOW
dialogues.text: EIGHT SHARKTICONS (in humanoid mode) surrounding them. Th Sharkticons are smaller than the Autobots, but they look and vicious. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't act hostile. I'll use the universal greeting.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Universal Greeting. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch.   I'll have them eating out of my hand. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or our faces. Kup holds out his hands to show that he has no weapon. he addresses them... KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bah-weep-Graaaaagnah wheep ni ni bong... HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mocking, mimicking) Bah-weep-Graaaaagnah wheep ni ni bong... The Sharkticons look interested.

dialogues.speaker: THING
dialogues.text: KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See, the Universal Greeting works every time. (pause) Now, without making any sudden moves, give them an Energon goody. Kup reaches into his belt, presses a button and pulls out an Energon cube. Hot Rod, somewhat suspicious of the whole process does the came. They hold out the cubes and two of the Sharkticons take t Energon cubes, like dogs getting a treat. Then, the other show up looking for cubes. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is getting expensive. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, they'll reciprocate. They each hand out three Energon goodies to the remaining six Sharkticons... The Sharkticons eat them happily. Then, they back off, eyeing the two Autobots with menace.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought they were supposed to reciprocate. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not sure of himself) Customs vary from place to place. Suddenly, the Sharkticons transform to their vicious mode and lunge at them. The two robots, taken by surprise, fall backwards. PAN FR the fallen robots to an area behind a tree. For just a moment, we see a small yellow Autobot in robot mode. Ther then, as quickly as we realize what it is, it transforms automode and vanishes in a flash. It was Wheelie.

dialogues.speaker: SHARKTICONS
dialogues.text: Sharkticons march Kup and Hot Rod into a HOLDING PEN with walled compound. As we FOLLOW THEM INTO PEN we PULL BACK PAN to establish that entry procession is being watched b THE QUINTESSONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: slender, spindly framed robotic creatures with oversized five sided heads, each side bearing a different mechanistic face with a different expression on each - smiling, angry, grimacing, suspicious and the fifth face is not yet to be seen. As Hot Rod and Kup are led to certain death in the Quintesson dungeons, harsh, dissonant, metallic and terrifying music plays, underscoring the brutal evil they face, KUP (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reminds me of the Niter Slave Mines on Golgonath Seven.... HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every place reminds you of some place else..... KUP (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Experience, lad. You should learn to appreciate it. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lot of good it's done us so far!

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD AND KUP
dialogues.text: as Hot Rod looks around and reacts sharply

dialogues.speaker: THE QUINTESSONS
dialogues.text: as we feature the Leader Quintesson who is taller and wea different color robe from others. He is watching arrival Kup and Hot Rod and his faces rotate so it goes from smil face to suspicious face to angry face to furious grimace.

dialogues.speaker: RESUME ON HOT ROD AND KUP
dialogues.text: as Sharkticons shove and prod them, JOLTING them into the holding pen and locking the gate. Then, they install RESTRAINING BOLTS. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't transform! KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're restraining bolts, lad. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking around) We got to get a new travel agent.... What is this place?

dialogues.speaker: HIS P.O.V.
dialogues.text: as a figure moves forward slightly and speaks in a harsh, bass'o voice. It is GRANIX. We saw him in the first scene escaping from his planet when Unicron ate it. {Note: The script says *G*ranix here. Not my mistake.} KRANIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The world of the savage Sharkticons and their cruel masters the Quintessons. They hunt down those who try to escape the wrath of Unicron, and put them on trial. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what if they're innocent? KRANIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guilty or innocent, the sentence is always the same - death! HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unicron?!    Who's Unicron?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KRANIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A planet six times the size of this one that absorbs everything in its path. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So that's the monster's name. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wonder if there's any connection between it and Galvatron. Suddenly, a Quintesson Guard roars in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That one! All turn and look off, reacting as two Guards thunder in, grab Granix and pull him back out of the door. {NOTE: Ano instance of the spelling of Granix}

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDING THE LEAD QUINTESSON
dialogues.text: as he points at Kup and Hot Rod QUINTESSON GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soon, you too shall receive your sentence.

dialogues.speaker: OUT THE WINDOW THE ARENA
dialogues.text: Kranix stands on what almost looks like a wide diving boa over a watery (or oily) pit teeming with Sharkticons. LEAD QUINTESSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jury, have you reached a verdict? JUROR #1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have your honor. LEAD QUINTESSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to jury of Quintessons) Guilty.....Or innocent. I repeat. KRANIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spare me this mockery of justice. LEAD QUINTESSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I repeat, guilty...or innocent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guilty!!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Jury's faces rotate to fifth expression - a DEATH'S HEAD GRANIX   {NOTE: Yet another, final, reference to Kranix a Granix} Suddenly, the Robot is dumped into a pit of teemi Sharkticons and there is a mad frenzy. In moments, he is more.

dialogues.speaker: KUP
dialogues.text: He watches grimly through the bars. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the end I'd wish for, lad.

dialogues.speaker: THE EDGE OF A HUGE, SHADOWY PLANET IN SPACE
dialogues.text: as Ultra Magnus' Shuttle is BUFFETED BY WINDS AND STORMS it enters the atmosphere of JUNKION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as it SHAKES AND RATTLES VIOLENTLY DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we, Springer? SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place where everything ends up after you throw it out.

dialogues.speaker: TIGHT ON BLURR
dialogues.text: as he holds up hands and CROSSES fingers.

dialogues.speaker: RESUME ON SPRINGER
dialogues.text: Tenses and crouches protectively around Arcee and Daniel we see mountains of junk whizz past the window. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brace for impact!

dialogues.speaker: ON SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: It plummets through the mountains and canyons of junk, narrowly avoiding crashing, but frequently hitting junk pinnacles or sides of junk walls, and causing avalanches junk. By the time the ship lands, it is nearly indistinguishable from the junk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is in a jumbled tangle - Ultra Magnus beneath Bl Perceptor upside down and hanging from torn end of stairw Arcee crouched over Daniel and Springer with half his bod sticking through the hull SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulling himself free of hull wall) Remind me to give the Auto Pilot a raise... Daniel creeps out from under Arcee and shakes bits of broken metal and dust off his shoulders DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! That was better'n the Roller Coaster at Future World! PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (working scanner, computer device, thoughtfully) The composition of this planet seems to be a chaotic amalgam of discarded ferrous and non-ferrous articulations. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (baffled) How's that? SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (opening hull door with a

dialogues.speaker: RIPPING OF METAL
dialogues.text: He says the planet's made of junk.

dialogues.speaker: SPRINGER AND PERCEPTOR AT OPEN DOOR
dialogues.text: as they look out on landscape of "living" junk SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep, this dump is a dump...... ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he straps on TOOL BELT ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We might be able to salvage this thing. (checks LASER DRILL, turns it on, off) Ultra Magnus starts for door followed by Blurr who takes up a saw and tool belt and Perceptor who rolls up Shuttle Plans as Daniel moves out to join them

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I help, too? SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's rough out there, kid. Stay inside and play with crayons or something. ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as she steps forward with a smile, a strange GRID LIKE "SUIT" in her hand ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think Daniel can make himself useful with....this! It used to be Spike's. (holds Grid-like metal frame "suit") DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! Dad's exo-suit. He told me about it but I never saw it. ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, try it on. She starts helping him into the exo-suit. ON DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he gets inside the "suit" which fits over his body like a grid-work metal "cage." Daniel clips "cage" of Exo-Suit shut and stands up inside gridwork which makes him taller and broader. He moves awkwardly, barely able to advance a step SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just think about what you want to do before you do it! DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: brows knitted, thinking. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't fight it Dan-O. He suddenly starts moving rapidly backwards, then sideway then forward, then he starts dancing rapidly, then bounce off walls... ..spinning upside down, then flips over seve times and lands in a splatter, legs spread, arms this way that - amused, startled and unhurt.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) It's kind of tricky.... He suddenly flips around twice in mid-air then regains hi feet and leans way over against Arcee for support. She la and pats his shoulder ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the first time out, you were great!

dialogues.speaker: ON SPRINGER AT DOOR
dialogues.text: as he sends down RAMP and motions to the others curtly SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show time's over! We've got work to do! (he starts out)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Springer, Arcee, Daniel et.al. come down the ramp and around at the lush "vegetation" of growing junk clumps al around them and a long vista of junk mountains and spires weathered junk-rock. DANIEL (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whistles) This must be the junk capital of the universe!

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL AND THE OTHERS
dialogues.text: as they start DIGGING for parts to repair the ship, sinis Junkions begin to emerge from the junk to watch them. The leader, WRECK-GAR, speaks to his fellow Junkions. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in guttural, rusty, metallic rumble) Stop thief! No welcome-wagon, "hello stranger!" that good coffee flavor OTHER JUNKIONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, or your money back! Wreck-Gar shows large JUNK GUN with all sorts of razor sharp fins and rusty little rocket missiles mounted around the howitzer like barrel

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Operators are standing by! They laugh in guttural, clanking sounds and look out at Springer and the others who keep working as we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At first, we see only the face of a sinister Quintesson gatekeeper, backed up by heavily armed Sharkticons. QUINTESSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Greetings, noble strangers.

dialogues.speaker: THE DINOBOTS
dialogues.text: They stand at the gate, looking more like kids showing up your door wondering if you can come out and play, than li serious robots on a serious mission. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, me, Grimlock, noble! Me, Grimlock search for friends.

dialogues.speaker: QUINTESSON AND GRIMLOCK
dialogues.text: The Quintesson, showing his friendly face, smiles. QUINTESSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And who might they be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Autobots.    Hot Rod and Kup. QUINTESSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (feigning recognition) Oh yes. A young one and an old one. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.   You know friends.   Where are they? QUINTESSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They went down that path. He points to... A PATH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It probably isn't lined with primroses, but it should be. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GRIMLOCK You good friend to Grimlock.    I reward you, sometime.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: With that, the four Dinobots head towards the "primrose path."

dialogues.speaker: THE QUINTESSON
dialogues.text: His head rotates and he smiles a sinister, evil smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Galvatron stands upon the demonic planet, in an extremely contorted position. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you torture me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have no idea where this godly voice is coming from, bu this place sure is spooky. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have failed. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Unicron. Ultra Magnus is dead. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then where is the matrix? GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Destroyed, with him. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The matrix can not be destroyed. (pause) And Ultra Magnus lives on the planet of Junk. Stalk him. Cut him open! And bring the matrix to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They step along the primrose path, not noticing as sinist things start to happen all around them.

dialogues.speaker: A METAL EATING PLANT
dialogues.text: This thing looks like a metal version of a "venus fly tra and it has a malevolent red eye which lights up. Swoop wa past it in humanoid mode.

dialogues.speaker: SNAP
dialogues.text: It misses him by an inch. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me Grimlock, positive Hot Rod and Kup close! Get thump, thump, thump... (taps his head hard)

dialogues.speaker: THE GROUND
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a section of stones drop away in front of Slag revealing a spiked pit... SLAG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, Slag say you are full of beryllium balony. He is just about to fall in when...

dialogues.speaker: GRIMLOCK AND SLAG
dialogues.text: Grimlock, in dino mode, slaps him with his tail, knocking away an instant before he steps into the hole... GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, Grimlock, say you full of cesium salami! Slag gets up... SLAG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beryllium balony! GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Argh!

dialogues.speaker: GRIMLOCK
dialogues.text: He is about to pounce on Slag when a massive tree, which actually more like a sword, suddenly is spring and arcs toward him. The machete like blade strikes the ground, between Grimlock and Slag narrowly missing them. He turns and sees the thing stocking in the ground. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, Grimlock think trees here are cheap model. SLAG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like your head! (laughs at own joke) Grimlock jumps on Slag and wrestles him to the ground. Suddenly, a SQUEAKY, ODDLY CHILDISH VOICE speaks from o.s.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SQUEAKY VOICE (WHEELIE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Friends find. Look behind. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furious) Who say that?

dialogues.speaker: WHEELIE
dialogues.text: WHEELIE is the Wolf Boy of Quintesson - an Autobot who's evading the Sharkticons since his parents' ship crashed, killing everybody else in his party. He wears a necklace Sharkticon teeth, packs a three bladed laser knife and a special SLING which hurls FIRE STONES. He fears nothing, especially the Dinobots, and he cockily struts into the clear... ... walks right up Sludge's tail onto Sludge's b and then shinnies up his neck and jumps onto... ... Slag' head where he stands eye to eye with Grimlock WHEELIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Friends find. Look behind.   Many Face lie. You fool! You buy!

dialogues.speaker: GRIMLOCK AND WHEELIE
dialogues.text: GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eyes blaze, furious) Me, Grimlock, "fool?" WHEELIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling breezily) Picture you got. Now fool you not! (he laughs in a wild, metallic cackle) Grimlock raises a claw to swipe Wheelie off Slag's head GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, Grimlock, no like you! ON WHEELIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he scowls and quickly loads FIRESTONE IN SLING and slings it onto Grimlock's nose where it EXPLODES making Grimlock yowl and pull back, feeling his reddened nose and speaking through his nose angrily GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Doooooooow! Why boy hit by dose?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: WHEELIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (folds arms across his chest) Wheelie say, find friends today! (nods defiantly) Grimlock and Slag react as we

dialogues.speaker: THE QUINTESSON "COURTROOM"
dialogues.text: Kup and Hot Rod stand on the platform over the Sharkticon pit. They are "bound" by restraining bolts.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUINTESSON JUDGE
dialogues.text: QUINTESSON JUDGE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before we deliver your verdict, would you like to beg for your lives?

dialogues.speaker: KUP AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Kup turns to Hot Rod. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember when you put me together today? HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) Sure, that's all I got to think about. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what part you forgot. QUINTESSON JUDGE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence or I'll hold you in contempt of this court. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have nothing but contempt for this court.

dialogues.speaker: THE QUINTESSON JUDGES
dialogues.text: Suddenly, their heads swivel around to deaths heads.

dialogues.speaker: ON KUP AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: The platform drops away and they tumble...

dialogues.speaker: KUP AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Kup in double-jointed fashion slips out of the restraining bolt...

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That doohickey you lost was part of my shoulder socket. Watch this, lad... without it, I'm double jointed as Houdini. Then, he transforms to humanoid mode and shoots off Hot R bolt. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wish you'd figured that out a little sooner. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better late than never!

dialogues.speaker: THE SHARKTICON PIT
dialogues.text: In full humanoid mode, they land, their weapons drawn.

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: Kup and Hot Rod fire, driving some Sharkticons back. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've got more Sharkticons than we have photon charges! Kup transforms to Auto mode. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's hold a demolition derby! Then, he roars into a bunch of them, slamming a massive stack into the wall.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He transforms, too and does the same thing.

dialogues.speaker: THE SHARKTICON PIT
dialogues.text: As fast as the Autobots can run the miserable things over new swarms of them come out.

dialogues.speaker: KUP AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: They clear out a circle in the center of the pit and transform to humanoid mode. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't even bend a fender.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but look. There are a lot more of those cam dinging, grill-crackin' things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is a wave of larger, more powerful Sharkticons. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't hold out forever, but we can give them one whopper of a repair bill.

dialogues.speaker: THE SHARKTICONS
dialogues.text: They charge Kup and Hot Rod Kup and Hot Rod fire into the destroying several, but are.... ... Soon overrun. The Sharkticons crawl all over them, munching on their metal.

dialogues.speaker: SUDDENLY --
dialogues.text: DINOBOTS (O.S.) (WAR WHOOP)

dialogues.speaker: THE DINOBOTS
dialogues.text: They fly down and land on the pile, transforming into Din mode.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLUDGE in brontosaurus mode, swats several around with hi tail, while stomping them with his feet. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lowers his teeth to devour a much smaller Sharkticon, the Sharkticon bares his teeth, realizes that he's a second stringer, and scampers away. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me Grimlock want to munch metal! Slag barrels into Sharkticons, making a quick shishkebob out of them, while... Swoop picks two up with his claws, flies in the air and d them on other Sharkticons. THE SHARKTICONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: suddenly back off and begin transforming (bowing) to the dinobots.

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: Kup and Hot Rod dig themselves out of a pile of Sharktico parts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never thought I'd be so happy to see those big bozos.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMLOCK
dialogues.text: He turns to Hot Rod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me Grimlock no bozo.   Me king!

dialogues.speaker: QUINTESSON JUDGES
dialogues.text: They look down, their angry faces showing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sharkticons! Execute them.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMLOCK
dialogues.text: He points to the Quintessons...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me Grimlock say execute them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: for a brief instant, don't seem to know what to do. Then, they charge the Quintessons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Quintessons start to flee, but it's clear that the Sharkticons, who climb over the stacked bodies of other Sharkticons, are going to catch them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think the problems on this planet will be solved very shortly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what about our problems.    We need a ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHEELIE You get a ship if I get a trip.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He turns to the little, feral, robot. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you.

dialogues.speaker: SLAG AND WHEELIE
dialogues.text: The dinobot lifts up Wheelie. SLAG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Him Wheelie, him friend. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOT ROD He'll be mine too, if he can find a Quintesson ship.

dialogues.speaker: WHEELIE
dialogues.text: He points into the distance...

dialogues.speaker: WHAT WE SEE
dialogues.text: is the strangest looking corkscrew ship   we've every see sticking out of the ground. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a ship?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN ACROSS an enormous stockpile of weaponry as we hear t terrible roar we have come to associate with Unicron. SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If this doesn't do it, nothing will.

dialogues.speaker: SPIKE
dialogues.text: He sets a timer to 20 seconds.   The L.E.D. clicks down. BUMBLEBEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: now with a new bumpersticker which is a Unicron with a red circle and slash through it, looks very fidgety. BUMBLEBEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: BUMBLEBEE AND SPIKE
dialogues.text: They run over to a small space ship as... ... The timer counts down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: takes off.

dialogues.speaker: THE SECOND MOON
dialogues.text: Now, for the first time, we see what is really going on. Unicron looms behind it, about to do the big munch.

dialogues.speaker: BUMBLEBEE AND SPIKE
dialogues.text: They roar away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His mist surrounds the planet...

dialogues.speaker: ON BUMBLEBEE AND SPIKE
dialogues.text: They stop their ship in space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five, four, three, two, one...

dialogues.speaker: BLAMMMOLA
dialogues.text: An incredible display of fireworks goes off, seemingly blowing Unicron to smithereens.

dialogues.speaker: ON BUMBLEBEE AND SPIKE
dialogues.text: They slap palms. Then, they look up, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It isn't even dented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The great Maw opens and we hear a grand cosmic roar! Suddenly, the smoke and space junk from the explosion are sucked into his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: ON BUMBLEBEE AND SPIKE
dialogues.text: They try to fly away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're being sucked into it!

dialogues.speaker: THEIR SHIP AND UNICRON
dialogues.text: Despite the fact that their thrusters are on full power, are still sucked into... UNICRON... Whose great mouth shuts when he's got the human and the Autobot.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS' SHUTTLE
dialogues.text: as Arcee and Springer work on the ship, while Perceptor watches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be sure the fittings are securely welded!

dialogues.speaker: BLURR
dialogues.text: as he uses FLAME JETS FROM FINGER TIPS TO WELD joints whe new "canopy" is fitted

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (very fast, as usual) Absolutely, positively, definitely...

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDE DANIEL
dialogues.text: as he helps Blurr install a junk part.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This exo-suit is fantastic! (to Blurr) Want me to do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weld? You? Really? Well, why not? Give it a try, but think it through first! Daniel knits his brow, extends FINGER OF EXO- GLOVE which is part of exo-suit.

dialogues.speaker: EXO GLOVE AND DANIEL'S HAND
dialogues.text: as hand quivers and his finger shoots out a tiny flame wh sputters, sparks and then goes out like a wet match

dialogues.speaker: RESUME ON BLURR AND DANIEL
dialogues.text: BLURR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Practice, practice, practice!

dialogues.speaker: WRECK-GAR AND JUNKIONS IN HIDING
dialogues.text: Wreck-Gar starts to motion them to the attack, and the Junkions ready their weapons. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forward, avanti, apfel and like, go for gusto.... (stops as OMINOUS ROAR comes from overhead and he looks up)

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON AND HUGE DECEPTICON FORCE
dialogues.text: WRECK-GAR (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on, this be industrial strength We watch... ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he, too, hears and then looks up and sees the Decepticon force ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Decepticons! (to Springer) We've got to draw them off and then double back to the ship!

dialogues.speaker: CYCLONUS
dialogues.text: with Galvatron piloting, races up and launches a particul nasty looking missile which streaks INTO SHOT and...

dialogues.speaker: ... BLAMMOLA
dialogues.text: Turns it into junk. Springer FIRES UP at INCOMING JETS, calling to the others SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cancel that last order.

dialogues.speaker: ON ARCEE, DANIEL, BLURR
dialogues.text: as Arcee transforms and moves off in one direction.   Dan looks at Blurr who is starting to transform

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do I do? BLURR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Transform! You can do... (TRANSFORMATION complete, he blurs off and, in V.O. adds) ...it! Blurr GOES OFF outblurring past HAIL OF LASER FIRE from Ramjet scorching by overhead ON DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he reacts, looks around, thinks, brows knitting, looking off, reacting DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Transform....

dialogues.speaker: SCAVENGER
dialogues.text: Coming at him from one side, Shrapnel coming from the oth side ON SCAVENGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he starts reaching for Daniel SCAVENGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Human germ! ON DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as his Exo-Suit SUDDENLY TRANSFORMS INTO auto mode and takes off and drives through... ...SCAVENGER AND SHRAPNEL, knocking them over. DANIEL (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wooooh!! GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: flies up to a ridge in advance of his forces, motioning to them to split off and follow...

dialogues.speaker: BIRD'S EYE VIEW
dialogues.text: They dash through the maze-like walls of junk, pursued by Sweeps, who strike them from above...

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SWEEP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lets out a rayblast...

dialogues.speaker: PERCEPTOR
dialogues.text: ... Hitting Perceptor and spinning him around... ... Unti stumbles to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: PERCEPTOR AND ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: ... Perceptor lies on the ground, stunned. ...     Ultra stops next to him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perceptor! ... Suddenly, shots tear into the junk all around them as

dialogues.speaker: A SWEEP
dialogues.text: ROARS towards them...

dialogues.speaker: PERCEPTOR
dialogues.text: He suddenly transforms to cannon mode and fires! ...   Bl the sweep to protons. ON PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He transforms to humanoid mode. PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It appears that my lacerations were primarily superficial. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then move it...

dialogues.speaker: PERCEPTOR
dialogues.text: He takes off. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stays behind, taking a few shots at... SWEEPS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: which streak over in deadly formations. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands and shoots. SPRINGER (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ultra Magnus!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Ultra Magnus turns to see...

dialogues.speaker: THE OTHER AUTOBOTS
dialogues.text: several yards down the junk-lined corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your estimated survival time is 10 seconds.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: He shoots at the junk walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then use that time to escape! The Matrix was designed for an emergency like this. I'll try to unleash its power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what if it doesn't work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until all are one!

dialogues.speaker: THE OTHER AUTOBOTS AND JUNK WALLS
dialogues.text: Ultra Magnus' ray hits the walls and they tumble down, separating him from the other Autobots.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: His back to a wall of fallen junk, he pulls out the matri

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON IN CYCLONUS
dialogues.text: Galvatron pops out of Cyclonus and both transform, to lan front of Ultra Magnus.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: Struggling to open the leadership matrix. He puts his han inside of it and gets a powerful shock! He pulls his hand quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it!   Open it!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: He laughs.

dialogues.speaker: ON ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: He still struggles. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (baffled) Prime, you said the Matrix would light our darkest hour.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: Four sweeps fly TOWARD CAMERA in formation.    Galvatron out a communication device from his helmet. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweeps, quarter him!

dialogues.speaker: THE SWEEPS
dialogues.text: Four rope-like rays shoot out of them and...

dialogues.speaker: ON ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: wrap around his arms and legs.

dialogues.speaker: ULTRA MAGNUS AND THE SWEEPS
dialogues.text: His arms and legs caught by the four ropes, he knows he's just about had it. He struggles for one last moment, then

dialogues.speaker: THE SWEEPS AND ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: Pulling their rays taut, the Sweeps fly in four separate directions, effectively drawing and quartering the Autobo leader...

dialogues.speaker: ON ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: As all of his limbs are separated from his body and scatt in the distance, he SCREAMS IN HORROR. ULTRA MAGNUS (SCREAMS IN HORROR)

dialogues.speaker: THE MATRIX
dialogues.text: It tumbles from Ultra Magnus' hands to... ... Galvatron's hands!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: He holds the Autobot Matrix.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unicron, my "master," with this I shall make you my slave! Galvatron gets into Cyclonus and flies off

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he moves out and looks down at Ultra Magnus' remains DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tearful) Ultra Magnus!

dialogues.speaker: BLURR, SPRINGER, ARCEE AND PERCEPTOR
dialogues.text: as they move up beside Daniel. BLURR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without the Matrix there is no hope.   No hope at all!

dialogues.speaker: WRECK-GAR AND AN ARMY OF JUNKIONS
dialogues.text: as they are moving in battle array towards the Shuttle. Junkions are an interesting species. They ride themselves That is, the Junkions ride transforms of themselves, so t if their vehicle breaks down, the driver will become the vehicle, and the vehicle will transform to become the dri They are gibbering, singing almost a wild kind of junk-ro war-cry song which, like their language, is constructed o bits and pieces of the museum junk of our culture - a humorous aggressive song which makes a surreal kind of se "Slice 'em dice 'em... And that's all folks or your money back..." ON WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he roars into the lead and shows his teeth WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't look behind door number two, Monty. It's time to play End-of-the-line-my valentine! Geroni-roni-doo-ron-ron-i-mo! (he charges)

dialogues.speaker: ON SPRINGER AND OUR FRIENDS
dialogues.text: as they react

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get gone! Springer leads the way and Blurr, Arcee, Daniel and Perce follow and we MOVE TO A ROAD WARRIOR STYLE CHASE as Sprin and Arcee ride on either side of Daniel and Perceptor wit Blurr bringing up the rear- - zig zagging back and forth keep the Junkions from getting at Daniel. A JUNKION

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: roars alongside Springer on his motorcycle and throws out laser barbed grappling hook, trying to hook Springer. Springer ducks first pass of hook. ON JUNKION

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he hurls GRAPPLING HOOK AGAIN ON SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he catches HOOK BY THE CHAIN AND YANKS

dialogues.speaker: IT
dialogues.text: THE JUNKION

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: goes flying off his motorcycle.,, He transforms into a motorcycle as The motorcycle transforms into a rider and hops on the new motorcycle and then... ...turns around to come back. ON SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over, astonished. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not hard to knock 'em down. It's getting them to stay down that's the trick. ON ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as she fires at a Junkion who is trying to swerve her off the road knocking him off the motorcycle... The Junkion looks down at his missing arm, digs around in the junk for a minute, comes up with another, and then transforms to a motorcycle. ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Junkion rides over to her, starts belting her with junk sword ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're indestructible!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ON DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he skids, stopping his Exo-Suit as he reacts to what's ahead DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're everywhere!

dialogues.speaker: PILES OF JUNK
dialogues.text: as Junkions arise out of every junk pile in sight and, gibbering, singing their junk-rock battle song, start mov in ON SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he stops and Arcee, Daniel, Perceptor and Blurr stop around him. They close ranks and look out at the Junkions grimly PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps they're not as vicious as they look. ON WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he gnashes his teeth and grins and then BLINKS HIS EYES which roll to show eyes like ping pong balls. Wreck-Gar makes blipping noises as he does this ON SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: reacting to Wreck-Gar's noises and eyeball display SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Perceptor) Positive thinking gets    on my nerves. Suddenly, all react to    sound and wind of passing space cruiser    their P.O.V- HOT ROD, KUP AND DINOBOTS    IN CRUISER as it shoots past and banks,    coming back for a closer look SPRINGER (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can't be....it's.....Hot Rod!     He's alive! DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he looks up at passing Cruiser and waves DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Kup and the Dinobots!    We're saved!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: PERCEPTOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't count on that! (indicating Junkions)

dialogues.speaker: EVEN MORE JUNKIONS ARISING OUT OF THE JUNK H
dialogues.text: as Junkions newly risen from Junk look up and point at Cruiser and make hostile signs toward it, shaking weapons etc.

dialogues.speaker: VIEW THROUGH CANOPY
dialogues.text: Hot Rod and Kup look down on the army of Junkions below surrounding their friends as they SWOOP BY KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not since the Crocodillos of Strontero have I seen such a sight....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he sticks his face up next to Hot Rod. Wheelie, riding Grimlock's head, slips down to stand on console next to H Rod GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe they make me king, too! KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't hold your breath, your majesty. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he watches Cruiser descend and start gliding in for a landing WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steady as she goes, mob! Snoopy visitors get mud in the eye bye and bye, and film at five! (gives thumbs up sign, RIDES

dialogues.speaker: OFF
dialogues.text: JUNKIONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything must go by midnight! With a SINGING ROAR of musical, tribal excitement, the Junkions sweep Springer and our friends along with them, following course of landing Cruiser to

dialogues.speaker: CRUISER LANDING SITE
dialogues.text: Cruiser sets down and Junkions line up with weapons aimed rampway as they watch door

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as Hot Rod steps out with big smile and hand full of energon sticks followed by a very wary Kup, and the Dinobots with Wheelie riding Sludge's neck.

dialogues.speaker: ON WRECK-GAR AND OTHER JUNKIONS
dialogues.text: as they react to hot Rod's smile, Wreck-Gar trying to mim that smile to his followers who laugh

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD
dialogues.text: as he steps up beside Kup and gently pushes Kup's rifle a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (aside to Kup, still holding smile)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guns aren't exactly friendly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through his teeth to Hot Rod) Neither are they in case you haven't noticed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) What was the Universal greeting again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: growls and slips a SNIPPER, BLOW TORCH CUTTING TOOL out of a holster and starts toward Hot Rod with it

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: (big smile) Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong?

dialogues.speaker: WRECK-GAR AND OTHER JUNKIONS
dialogues.text: They look at one another, blink, then beam with smiles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nodding, smiling) Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: HOT ROD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (presses energon sticks forward) As Hot Rod says this... ...Wreck-Gar takes the energon sticks and holds them over head and... ...all the Junkions smile and cheer and start chanting the universal greeting phrase, laughing, clappin their hands and dancing around, taking Arcee's hand and.. ... taking Springer and Perceptor and Daniel out into cen of a square dance type gathering, moving back and forth w them dancing happily, singing the universal greeting in a melodic, rhythmic way EVERYBODY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong! Bah weep graaaagnah wheep ni ni bong.... WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hugs Hot Rod, and Perceptor who winces and tries to enjoy it, and then hugs Daniel, Wheelie, Arcee, laughing and dancing as SINGING goes. ON GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he reacts to Wreck-Gar kissing his leg GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yuck! Me Grimlock, not a kisser!   Me, Grimlock, a king! WHEELIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: claps his hands and gleefully makes noises as he hops about, dancing with Junkions until we CUT TO WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he stands on top of platform and RINGS JUNK BELLS AND SIRENS getting silence and smiling as he waves hands all around WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have a nice day and please, close cover before striking, friends! Amigos, buddies and side kicks, Breep drit, aw rootie! So say the Junkions! (holds hands over his head)

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He looks at them, strangely. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you learn to talk like that?

dialogues.speaker: WRECK-GAR
dialogues.text: He reaches into his body, and about where a heart or some other organ would be, he pulls out a Watchman. THE WATCHMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On it is a crazy Eddy-type commercial. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We talk T.V. You talk some T.V.? KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks around nervously. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I talk some TV. And now, Hot Rod for the news. Don't touch that dial. Void where prohibited. JUNKIONS cheer wildly while the Dinobots react with uncertainty

dialogues.speaker: RESUME ON WRECK-GAR
dialogues.text: as he points off and shouts happily. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By George kimosabes your smashed up, blotto friend, soon like brand new with ninety day warranty all iciban parts and labor is!

dialogues.speaker: JUNKIONS WITH ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: The Junkions move Ultra Magnus' mangled body through an amazing assembly line, quickly piecing together his body parts, using junk when they can't find a part. Then, they lube him, dust him, spray him and polish him. Then, Wreck hits a switch, and Ultra Magnus' eye lights go on. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy motoring! Cock-a-doodle-do!

dialogues.speaker: ON ULTRA MAGNUS
dialogues.text: as he steps away from Junkion line of reconstruction and group consisting of Hot Rod, Kup and Springer. SPRINGER AND OTHERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Ad lib jubilation) Ultra Magnus! ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're all alive...

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The matrix! All turn to Ultra Magnus. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's gone... KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And with it, all hope. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... (inspired) The matrix will not fail us. ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't you hear Ultra Magnus. We don't have it anymore. Galvatron does. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we've got to trust in ourselves, and no matter what they odds, destroy Unicron. ON WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes light up. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! Destroy Unicron... Kill the grand poobah.... Flush cosmic troubles down the drain.

dialogues.speaker: JUNKIONS
dialogues.text: JUNKIONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (almost chanting) Destroy Unicron... Kill the grand poobah... Flush cosmic troubles down the drain.

dialogues.speaker: SPRINGER
dialogues.text: The Quintesson ship in the BACKGROUND. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen,   I don't want to rain on anybody's parade,   but how are we going to move the army to   Unicron. We don't have enough room on   that ship.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No fuss, no muss. (to others) Hurry, hurry. Sale must end! Rush right on down to bridge and test drive latest with no obligation. Suddenly, several Junkions scramble to concealed doorways the Junk. ULTRA MAGNUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have ships here? WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New, improved Junkion planet, is sleek sexy import with turbo handling. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he talking about?

dialogues.speaker: QUINTESSON
dialogues.text: Suddenly, boosters fire from the back side of the junk, a somewhere under all of the junk, we realize is a real spa ship. Maybe the junk is the space ship. It takes off, bit and pieces of junk flying off as it moves. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what I call traveling in style.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: as Galvatron stands on the surface of Unicron, holding th Matrix. GALVATRON (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me, or suffer the consequences. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aren't we getting pompous? GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I now possess that which you most fear. Unicron LAUGHS and the force of it rocks the surface of the planet, knocking Galvatron to his knees. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will do my bidding, or... Unicron roars with laughter.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...taste my wrath. He leans down and starts trying to open the matrix.

dialogues.speaker: FAVORING GALVATRON
dialogues.text: IN THE BACKGROUND, we see Cybertron getting closer. Galva struggles with the Matrix, but gets a big shock. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You underestimate me Galvatron.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON ON UNICRON
dialogues.text: He desperately struggles to open the matrix. The planet suddenly starts shaking. Galvatron is bathed in a reddish light, and looks up in horror!

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: A hideous transformation is beginning. The surface of the planet in front of Galvatron opens up, and we see that th hideous light comes from eyes set on a hideous head!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON AND UNICRON
dialogues.text: Galvatron is maybe the size of a single tooth on the horr head before him. UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a time, I considered sparing your measly little planet, but now you shall witness its dismemberment!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the ground he stands on drops away, and he fall through space... ... Landing on a protruding plate which sticks out of Unicron's chest.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: He looks around himself in horror and lets out a loud scr as he realizes the unimaginable horror that surrounds him

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: The massive planet transforms, arms and legs fold out of enormous body, hands unfold from the arms, jets from it's back propel it towards... ... Cybertron, which, now looks lonely and vulnerable in space.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: He stands on a ledge on Unicron and desperately tries to the matrix, but no cigar. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!!!

dialogues.speaker: CYBERTRON
dialogues.text: Unicron enters shot and grasps at Cybertron with a hideou claw...

dialogues.speaker: A TOWER ON CYBERTRON
dialogues.text: Shockwave talks into a communications device, as alarms s and troopers run everywhere. SHOCKWAVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Decepticons...we're under attack...Scramble - Then his voice is cut off as...

dialogues.speaker: OUT HIS WINDOW
dialogues.text: Unicron's hand reaches towards the window, squeezes, and walls crash in.

dialogues.speaker: SPACE
dialogues.text: Unicron tears off the tower and crushes it as...

dialogues.speaker: A FLEET OF DECEPTICON SHIPS
dialogues.text: streak out of Cybertron and begin firing on the enormous planet. Here, we see the true scale of Unicron. The fight are the size of bees as they attack.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: He looks down on the swarm of fighters and... ...Breathes fire down on them. The fighters POP and burn like popcorn a blowtorch. In moments they disappear like sparks from a fire.

dialogues.speaker: CYBERTRON
dialogues.text: Decepticon troopers man a massive gun emplacement as... . Unicron's huge hand reaches down... ... scraping building and... ... tearing out gun emplacements.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON'S FACE
dialogues.text: as he puts his face down so his mouth will receive all th rockets, laser blasts, etc.

dialogues.speaker: THE DECEPTICON DEFENDERS
dialogues.text: are silhouetted like ants in the foreground as Unicron OP HIS MOUTH and swallows the fire barrage GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GALVATRON Stop feeding him, you fools!

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON AND CYBERTRON
dialogues.text: As yet more Decepticon fighters rip out of the planet, it looks like Unicron is going to have a field day tearing i apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The massive Junkion ship and the corkscrew cruiser pilote Hot Rod and Kup race through the dark void. HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod, Kup, Springer, Arcee and Daniel as they also loo through canopy, astonished DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! THEIR P.O.V. - UNICRON Destroying CYBERTRON HOT ROD (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't it remind you of something, Kup?

dialogues.speaker: RESUME ON KUP, DANIEL AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: as they MOVE CLOSER STILL. Kup is glassy eyed. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (entranced) Nope, never seen anything like it.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew there had to be a first time.... (using intercom) Battle stations!

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD'S CRUISER AND THE JUNKION SPACE SHIP
dialogues.text: as hatches open and the Dinobots start FLYING OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod shoves joystick forward and Cruiser DRIVES TOWARD UNICRON whom we see turn to take a swat at it through gla canopy

dialogues.speaker: ON JUNKION SPACE SHIP
dialogues.text: as it pulls up beside Hot Rod's Cruiser so they are both line.....The Dinobots behind both ships ...all diving tow Unicron's nose

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Wreck-Gar also has joystick shoved down and watches Unicron's face loom closer, closer, closer

dialogues.speaker: CRUISER, JUNKION SHIP AND DINOBOTS IN FORMATIO
dialogues.text: as Unicron smiles and cups both hands together, preparing catch the lot of them as soon as they get within reach UNICRON'S CHEST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Galvatron, the matrix hanging around his neck. Transforms to Cannon and fires up at... ... A bright panel on Unicron's chest...

dialogues.speaker: BLAAAM
dialogues.text: He hits the panel and lights and sparks fly out, causing gigantic robot to flicker momentarily.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: The monster lets out a ROAR! Then, reaches down, picks up Galvatron and drops him into his mouth like a raisin.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: He drops into the deep pit of Unicron's mouth, narrowly avoiding both a torrent of fire, and his sharp, crushing teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they Junkion cruiser comes close, Unicron lets out a b of fire... ... Flames lick the ship, but when the fire subsides, nothing has happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patented enamel resists fire, rain and corrosion. Five year warranty, satisfaction guaranteed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or your money back! The ship fires back, dumping rays into... ... Unicron's f but not really doing any damage.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON AND JUNKION CRUISER
dialogues.text: Unicron grabs the Junkion cruiser with both of it's hands and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... tears it in half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unshakable, unbreakable, unbeatable. And for a limited time we include...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Ultra Magnus, Perceptor and the others watch in amazement...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Free bonus surprise!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Free bonus surprise!

dialogues.speaker: THE JUNKIONS RUN AROUND
dialogues.text: welding things... ...screwing things together... ... and kicking control panels to make them work...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both halves of the Junkion ship act as independent space ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most unscientific, but... effective.

dialogues.speaker: EXT THE SPACE BATTLE
dialogues.text: As the Quintesson ship shoots toward Unicron's face. THE CRUISER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is suddenly struck by a ray from Unicron's eye, and half of it is knocked off.

dialogues.speaker: INT THE CRUISER
dialogues.text: Lights go off, and the Autobots are thrown around like to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are heading right to Unicron's eye.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON AND THE CRUISER
dialogues.text: Unicron swipes at the cruiser, but misses. The Cruiser crashes right through Unicron's eye like a corkscrew! UNICRON (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Graaaaaaaaaaa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cruiser rips through the eye socket and smashes throu several electrical membranes that are, in fact, Unicron's brain.

dialogues.speaker: THE SHIP
dialogues.text: As the ship tumbles through, it dumps off the various Autobots like rubbish and disintegrates.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He tumbles out of the rubbish and down a deep pit (which can assume is a robotic sinus or something)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup, Springer, Daniel and Arcee are scattered about the f in the giant, flickering chamber. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Hot Rod? SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sees something in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, but I hope they didn't get him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are dozens of hovering Robots that look like floating bea traps, snapping their jaws as they drift slowly towards t Autobots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debugoids!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick!   This way. They run into a long, cave-like chamber which looks like central nervous system or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod drops through the darkness and lands in a pile of miscellaneous junk.

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He slowly gets up and looks around the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pan as Hot Rod looks over various different bits of junk, until he sees the glowing shape of the Autobot Matrix apparently suspended in mid air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Autobot Matrix! Then, suddenly two red, burning eyes light up above the matrix, and we see the hideous form of Galvatron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It will do you no good, Autobot.   It cannot be opened.

dialogues.speaker: ON HOT ROD
dialogues.text: He stands up and walks towards Galvatron.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not by a Decepticon.

dialogues.speaker: HOT ROD AND GALVATRON
dialogues.text: Hot Rod steps towards Galvatron. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is strange that we should find ourselves as allies... ON GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, his body is violently twisted, and his arms are almost broken off. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhhhh... UNICRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Destroy him, or feel yourself torn from limb to limb. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course, my master!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Galvatron takes a shot at Hot Rod. ... Hot Rod dives away electricity seems to flash everywhere. ON GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He peers into the gloom.

dialogues.speaker: PANNING THE ROOM
dialogues.text: Hot Rod is nowhere to be seen amidst all of the junk. ON GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weapon drawn. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puny Autobot, you lack even Prime's courage. There is no response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ASSORTED SHOTS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unicron now stands atop Cybertron, fighting the various ships that swarm around him like bees. ... Rays streak from his one good eye. ... (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ASSORTED SHOTS (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His hands smash fighters... ... Fire shoots from his mouth. THE DINOBOTS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now reaching Unicron's butt, start kicking. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me Grimlock kick Butt.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: Suddenly; he looks down, sending down a searing blast of fire.

dialogues.speaker: THE DINOBOTS
dialogues.text: They transform to robot mode and fly away. GRIMLOCK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, Grimlock, need new strategy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kup, Arcee, Springer and Daniel dash down the corridor. Suddenly, Daniel's foot is caught in a maze of wiring.

dialogues.speaker: THE OTHERS
dialogues.text: Not noticing, they keep running.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: He tries to pull his foot out. No luck. Then, he looks up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Robotic Antibodies are drawing very close to him. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks o.s. towards the others. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help...

dialogues.speaker: KUP AND ARCEE
dialogues.text: They turn around and see Daniel about to be munched by th antibodies. ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel!

dialogues.speaker: SPRINGER, KUP AND ARCEE
dialogues.text: They dash down the corridor firing on...

dialogues.speaker: THE ROBOTIC ANTIBODIES
dialogues.text: Their shots hit some, knocking them to scrap, but there a so many of them, that they can't hold back the tide as it

dialogues.speaker: THE ANTIBODIES
dialogues.text: Daniel, unscathed by the things, which hover over his hea munching their way towards the Autobots, gets his foot fr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm okay.    They don't even see me.

dialogues.speaker: THE AUTOBOTS
dialogues.text: It looks like Custer's last stand as they are surrounded the vicious antibodies. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They must not programmed to catch flesh creatures. SPRINGER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Us, on the other hand... ARCEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel... Try to find help! Arcee fires...

dialogues.speaker: TRACKING
dialogues.text: Misses the Antibodies, but strikes a large tube.

dialogues.speaker: THE TUBE
dialogues.text: When it is hit, it pours a torrent of liquid which... ... Goes over the swarm of Antibodies, but hits Daniel... ... Carrying him away in a flood of glowing liquid.

dialogues.speaker: ON DANIEL
dialogues.text: He shouts as he finds himself in a river of flowing goo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniel    rips through what seem to be endless caves on t torrent    of liquid, until he is dumped down a high wate into...    .... A glowing lake. ... He stays under for a moment,    and then bobs up to see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the central processing area for Unicron's "food" and "energy." A long conveyer belt drops junk into a clear, bubbling vat, where it is separated into raw material and energy. The energy, which comes out in raw form, goes into a machine and is crunched into energon cubes, while the solid material, is separated into it's component metals and plastics, formed into ingots and sent elsewhere in an assembly line fashion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: watches this with awe until he sees...

dialogues.speaker: THE ASSEMBLY LINE
dialogues.text: ... Several Decepticon troopers hanging from cables like shirts at a dry cleaners are dropped into the bubbling va and in moments converted to nothing... ... Then, Cliffjum and Jazz roll out of the line...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He dashes to the shores of the glowing lake...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cliffjumper! Jazz! And then Spike comes rolling down, followed by Bumblebee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bumblebee!     Dad!

dialogues.speaker: ON CLIFFJUMPER, JAZZ, AND SPIKE
dialogues.text: They look down, but can't move because they are held by massive pincers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut off the control, Daniel. Daniel looks around. Then, he sees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..     which controls the whole thing. ON DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs up a catwalk towards it....

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: He reaches the flickering panel. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do I do? It doesn't have any buttons or anything.

dialogues.speaker: SPIKE
dialogues.text: He looks down. SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoot it, Son. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I don't have a gun. SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use your exo-suit.

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: He looks down at his hand and concentrates as hard as he Then, a spark comes out. It grows longer.

dialogues.speaker: THE MACHINE
dialogues.text: Spike and the Autobots are about to go in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry! DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Starts frying the command console!

dialogues.speaker: THE LINE
dialogues.text: It keeps moving. Then, Cliffjumper is dropped in!

dialogues.speaker: DANIEL
dialogues.text: He looks back, and to his horror sees Jazz, Bumblebee and father about to be dropped in. He keeps firing. The panel starts exploding!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't stop it!

dialogues.speaker: THE ASSEMBLY LINE
dialogues.text: Jazz drops in, then Bumblebee, then Spike. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: turns around and sees this. DANIEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad! There is no answer. Play the moment. Then... SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son.

dialogues.speaker: THE VAT
dialogues.text: It is empty. The Autobots and Spike sit at the bottom, smoking but alright. SPIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Galvatron, the Matrix at his neck, stalks around the room Looking everywhere for Hot Rod. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come out, Autobot. We all must die sometime. Suddenly, shockingly, Hot Rod jumps out of the floor and grabs Galvatron, sinking his fist into the Decepticon's f GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: stumbles backward.

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON AND HOT ROD
dialogues.text: Galvatron jumps at Hot Rod... ...   Hot Rod transforms to car and races away...

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: He transforms to cannon mode and fires... ... Hot Rod transforms to humanoid mode and the shot goes through his legs. ...   Then, he fires back at Galvatron... ...

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Hitting him as he transforms back to humanoid mode and angering him. .Raises his gun, then lowers it. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I will crush you with bare hands. Hot Rod transforms back to car and tries to race away... ... Galvatron jumps after him and catches him... ... Hot Rod, nearly pinned by Galvatron transforms to humanoid mode. ... Galvatron wrestles him to his back.. ... The Adolesce Robot tries to fight back, but the other is stronger. ... Galvatron puts his hands around Hot Rod's neck and starts squeezing. ... We hear the crunching of metal. GALVATRON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First Prime, then Ultra Magnus and now you. It is a pity Autobots die so easily or I might have a sense of satisfaction now. Hot Rod desperately gasps and pulls at Galvatron's hands...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unicron shoots down more Decepticons with his remaining e while he crushes the Junkion ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls crush in.    The Junkions and the Autobots are smashed together. WRECK-GAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ashes to ashes. Junk to junk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Galvatron still strangles Hot Rod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gasps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Die! ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Hot Rod, his hands, nearly dead, spring to life for a moment and grasp the Matrix which hangs from Galvatron's chest.

dialogues.speaker: THE MATRIX
dialogues.text: Suddenly, it lights up. ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A miraculous transformation takes place. ... Hot Rod begins to grow at an alarming rate. ... Age shows on his face. ... He is stronger and wiser. OPTIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arise, Rodimus Prime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Optimus!

dialogues.speaker: GALVATRON
dialogues.text: He fires at Hot Rod as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nooooooo! ... Hot Rod gets up. ...    The shot doesn't even dent hi HOT ROD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the end of the road, Galvatron. With that, he picks up the Decepticon and throws him through...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Unicron's side...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hot Rod, bathed in the glow of the matrix. Sticks his han in the way we saw Galvatron and Ultra Magnus try earlier. There is no shock. Then, like pulling the pin on a hand grenade, he unleashes the spiritual equivalent of a bomb!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The matrix rips through Unicron's body, blowing up wires causing floods and generally causing havoc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unicron suddenly lets out a scream and lets go of the Jun ship, sending it hurtling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It tumbles through space.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOBOTS AND JUNKIONS
dialogues.text: (THEY SCREAM WITH EXHILARATION)

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: Suddenly,    he starts tearing into his body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unicron writhes in space, tearing himself apart, ripping a leg, and sending out sparks like a roman candle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are overrun by the antibodies. One takes a whopper b out of Springer's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm almost out of energy. Suddenly, he looks up and sees one of the creatures explode above HIM. Then another explodes, then another.

dialogues.speaker: A WALL OF ANTIBODIES
dialogues.text: Suddenly, every antibody in the wall begins exploding, an through the carnage, we see Bumblebee, Spike, Daniel, Cliffjumper and Jazz.

dialogues.speaker: THE BATTLE
dialogues.text: The last of the antibodies is blown away, and Kup, Arcee Springer sit up amidst a pile of antibody bodies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I call the nick of time.

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: Suddenly, an entire wall vanishes as Unicron's hand tears things.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: JAZZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's burn rubber!

dialogues.speaker: THE TUNNEL
dialogues.text: They transform. The humans jump in.

dialogues.speaker: THE CHASE
dialogues.text: They race up the tunnel, one step ahead    of Unicron's h which shoots after them, pulling apart    what we know mu pieces of his brain... Then, they reach    what seems lik dead end. In fact, it is the back side     of Unicron's g eye. The hand comes in after them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An unbelievably fast and powerful robot races towards the Autobots. When it gets there, we realize that it is Rodim Prime. KUP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew you had potential, lad!

dialogues.speaker: RODIMUS PRIME
dialogues.text: RODIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Autobots, transform and roll out. Rodimus Prime transforms into truck mode as the other Autobots also transform. Daniel and Spike jump into him. Then, in a continuous line, he shoots off, the other Autobots racing behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rodimus Prime shoots out the second eye...    Followed by others.

dialogues.speaker: UNICRON
dialogues.text: An arm and a leg dangle uselessly as the Autobot essence spreads throughout the body, blowing circuits. Suddenly, Unicron lets out a loud agonized ROAR. SPARKS seem to sho out of every part of his body. Then, he spins in space li some kind of a fireworks display, shooting off sparks. An then...

dialogues.speaker: BANG
dialogues.text: We get the big visual explosion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unicron's head orbits Cybertron. PAN to Cybertron where a PUSH IN on Rodimus Prime, Arcee, Kup, Springer, Ultra Mag Wreck-Gar, Daniel, Perceptor, Blaster and Spike watch construction being done on Cybertron below. RODIMUS PRIME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let this mark the end of the Cybertronian wars as we move forward to a new age of peace and happiness.... ALL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until all are one!
